e9190f5f9a899dc6989e9b8d2ec138c10ba1dfd6.headline: Death Toll in Iran Protest Violence Rises to 116 Amid Government

a990dd612f38b31990cbc663f4b1977916d1a289.summary: Actor T.K. Carter, known for his role as Nauls in the 1982 film 'The Thing,' was found dead at his home in Duarte, California, on January 9. He was 69 years old and had more than 60 acting credits in his career.
a990dd612f38b31990cbc663f4b1977916d1a289.headline: Actor T.K. Carter Found Dead at 69 in California Home

700eb65727294bde4822ac4df9f8135e3a527b67.summary: Aston Villa eliminated Tottenham Hotspur from the FA Cup with goals from Emiliano Buendia and Morgan Rogers. This marks Tottenham's second loss to Aston Villa this season and increases pressure on manager Thomas Frank.
700eb65727294bde4822ac4df9f8135e3a527b67.headline: Aston Villa Knock Tottenham Out of FA Cup

da8802204c9ace95739875a67a0b2dc3b6457b8e.summary: Alex Bregman and the Chicago Cubs have agreed to a five-year, $175 million contract, according to multiple reports. The deal includes a no-trade clause and is pending a physical. Bregman, who played for the Red Sox last season, was one of the top free agents this offseason.
da8802204c9ace95739875a67a0b2dc3b6457b8e.headline: Alex Bregman Agrees to Five Year

d367200be0af07a1db5f4f30452a97d6b5f99bbb.summary: Rams quarterback Matthew Stafford injured his throwing hand during the game against the Panthers. X-rays taken after the game showed no major damage, but Stafford will undergo further tests on his finger. His status for upcoming games remains to be determined.
d367200be0af07a1db5f4f30452a97d6b5f99bbb.headline: Matthew Staffords X Rays Show No Major Damage After Finger Injury

c4d0fa0620f6dd4ad31b70127a7fa0d852b4eb95.summary: Iran has warned it will retaliate against US military bases and Israel if attacked, as protests over an economic crisis continue with more than 100 reported deaths in two days. The Iranian president has called for unity, while Donald Trump said the US is ready to help amid the ongoing unrest.
c4d0fa0620f6dd4ad31b70127a7fa0d852b4eb95.headline: Iran Warns of Retaliation Amid Deadly Protests and US Tensions

3a7adc74845b780e143df8af83ac2a2ac07d6bf0.summary: At least 538 people have been killed in anti-government unrest across Iran, according to activists. The country remains under an internet and phone blackout as civil unrest continues.
3a7adc74845b780e143df8af83ac2a2ac07d6bf0.headline: At Least 538 Killed in Ongoing Unrest Across Iran

ee3e502acede76ab18787a1940471b9c64ba17bc.summary: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem announced that hundreds more federal agents will be sent to Minnesota following the fatal ICE shooting of Renee Good. Demonstrations have taken place in several US cities, and Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey has called for state officials to be included in the FBI's investigation. Noem described the incident as domestic terrorism, a claim Frey disputes.
ee3e502acede76ab18787a1940471b9c64ba17bc.headline: More Federal Agents Sent to Minnesota After ICE Shooting Sparks

f64670f4d1813b6553d419e64ba8283d08cc5c80.summary: Carolina Panthers starting left tackle Ickey Ekwonu suffered a ruptured patella tendon in his right knee during Saturday's playoff loss. Coach Dave Canales said Ekwonu will miss significant time, with a recovery expected to take six to twelve months, impacting the team's offseason plans.
f64670f4d1813b6553d419e64ba8283d08cc5c80.headline: Panthers Ickey Ekwonu Out 6 12 Months With Ruptured Patella Tendon

1ec216d88f837dcda7e604cb7e9686be4861e6a1.summary: Ben Johnson and the Chicago Bears defeated the Green Bay Packers twice in one season for the first time since 2007. After the Bears' comeback win, Johnson expressed strong emotions in a postgame locker room speech.
1ec216d88f837dcda7e604cb7e9686be4861e6a1.headline: Bears Beat Packers Twice in Season for First Time Since 2007

f0ccdabe04ea38111912a5db120d3503f169f6b5.summary: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer has resisted calls for an Australian-style ban on social media use for under-16s. Pressure has increased after both Conservative figures and Labour's Greater Manchester mayor, Andy Burnham, expressed support for such restrictions, following Australia's recent implementation of the policy.
f0ccdabe04ea38111912a5db120d3503f169f6b5.headline: Starmer Resists Calls for Under 16 Social Media Ban Amid Growing

e5b0e2a7d4512da3819e5354055de581b667e139.summary: The Buffalo Bills lead the Jacksonville Jaguars 10-7 at halftime in their Wild Card playoff game. The game is being played in Jacksonville, with Josh Allen starting for the Bills and Trevor Lawrence for the Jaguars.
e5b0e2a7d4512da3819e5354055de581b667e139.headline: Bills Lead Jaguars 10 7 at Halftime in Wild Card Playoff Game

481025391c0dff70790203b2c656fe16b4620918.summary: Iowa football added former South Dakota running back L.J. Phillips Jr. from the transfer portal. Texas secured a commitment from NC State running back Hollywood Smothers, who had previously pledged to Alabama. The transfer portal opened January 2, leading to increased roster changes.
481025391c0dff70790203b2c656fe16b4620918.headline: Iowa and Texas Add Top Running Backs Through Transfer Portal Moves

e4bb4725b41f1dbf2be14cf6fed8a7fa0d452e8a.summary: Gabriel Martinelli scored his first senior hat-trick as Arsenal came from behind to defeat Portsmouth 4-1 in the FA Cup third round, securing their place in the next round.
e4bb4725b41f1dbf2be14cf6fed8a7fa0d452e8a.headline: Martinelli Hat Trick Leads Arsenal to 4 1 FA Cup Win Over

3ce6963b791faa2d2ce42342470021931cffecbc.summary: Tens of thousands of people protested in Minneapolis and other US cities following the fatal ICE shooting of Renee Good. Demonstrators marched to the site of the shooting, calling for accountability. Protests have continued for several days after Good's death.
3ce6963b791faa2d2ce42342470021931cffecbc.headline: Protests Continue Nationwide After Fatal ICE Shooting in Minneapolis

d5565d2ab39c000949b61b3707e6261e8d4ca1e6.summary: Orlando Magic center Moritz Wagner will return from a torn left ACL and make his season debut on Sunday against the Pelicans, after missing most of last season and the start of this campaign.
d5565d2ab39c000949b61b3707e6261e8d4ca1e6.headline: Moritz Wagner Set for Season Debut After ACL Injury

bf8bb592340b5d9807d5ce26c67ebc3dc7f77927.summary: Kings point guard Dennis Schroder was suspended three games without pay by the NBA for confronting and attempting to hit Lakers' Luka Doncic after a game on December 28. The incident reportedly occurred in the hallway of Crypto.com Arena following the Kings' loss to the Lakers.
bf8bb592340b5d9807d5ce26c67ebc3dc7f77927.headline: Dennis Schroder Suspended Three Games for Confronting Luka Doncic

d6ec15627a9bd2d2105075bf1e89560512ba2b09.summary: Dar Global and Trump Organization have announced a $10 billion partnership to develop hotel and golf projects in Saudi Arabia, marking the first collaboration between the Trump family business and the kingdom’s wealth fund.
d6ec15627a9bd2d2105075bf1e89560512ba2b09.headline: Dar Global and Trump Organization Announce $10 Billion Saudi Projects

46d7d36341fb5da29775d86810e2a2a5a8ceafc6.summary: Over 1,000 apartment buildings in Kyiv remain without heating after a Russian strike earlier this week, according to local authorities.
46d7d36341fb5da29775d86810e2a2a5a8ceafc6.headline: Kyiv Still Lacks Heat in Over 1

efe23bab7446adeb940460943c0d3c8e83780f18.summary: Trump is reviewing possible responses as Iran intensifies its crackdown on protests. A briefing on U.S. options regarding the situation in Iran is scheduled for Tuesday. Iran has warned it will retaliate if the U.S. intervenes.
efe23bab7446adeb940460943c0d3c8e83780f18.headline: Trump Reviews U.S. Options as Iran Cracks Down on Protests

b04d79b68419c8ae5a4a9bb6bef97f04ffa5b586.summary: Derek Martin, known for playing Charlie Slater in BBC One's EastEnders from 2000 to 2011 and making appearances until 2016, has died at age 92.
b04d79b68419c8ae5a4a9bb6bef97f04ffa5b586.headline: EastEnders Actor Derek Martin Dies at 92

c89e78215a35f2f79b5608e814361962eae966a6.summary: The US military conducted large-scale strikes across Syria targeting Islamic State positions, following the deaths of two US service members and an interpreter in a December attack in Palmyra. The Pentagon stated these actions are part of ongoing operations against the group.
c89e78215a35f2f79b5608e814361962eae966a6.headline: US Launches Strikes in Syria After Deadly Attack on Troops

08b2e0f3973ebf2930a39aaf592f51bdc816f0de.summary: Russian forces launched attacks on Kyiv, causing injuries, while Ukrainian drones struck Voronezh, killing one person and wounding three, according to local officials. Both sides reported casualties in the latest cross-border attacks.
08b2e0f3973ebf2930a39aaf592f51bdc816f0de.headline: Russian Strikes Hit Kyiv

31a6e4f7878df7f3fc667deed6b1938ac76311a7.summary: Peter Mandelson has declined to apologize to Jeffrey Epstein's victims for maintaining a friendship with Epstein, stating he was unaware of Epstein's criminal activities.
31a6e4f7878df7f3fc667deed6b1938ac76311a7.headline: Mandelson Refuses to Apologize for Friendship With Epstein

0ec623f24d9b1449fbb0cf4295d364503daeb102.summary: Erich von Däniken, the Swiss author known for popularizing ancient-alien theories, has died at the age of 90, according to multiple news sources.
0ec623f24d9b1449fbb0cf4295d364503daeb102.headline: Erich von Daeniken, Swiss author who popularised ancient‑alien theories, dies at 90 - Reuters

893206b265b524d0bbf2606d9ab6fdcec11ecec8.summary: Protests in Iran are ongoing, with some observers suggesting the country is nearing a significant political change. The potential for major shifts in Iran's government could have global impacts, but no change in leadership has occurred as of January 11, 2026.
893206b265b524d0bbf2606d9ab6fdcec11ecec8.headline: Protests Continue in Iran Amid Speculation of Major Political Change

257c19bb50baf05e40f36808f3149175300a8563.summary: The UK and Germany are discussing the possibility of deploying NATO forces in Greenland to address tensions and concerns related to a perceived US threat. Germany plans to propose a NATO mission in the Arctic aimed at easing strife in Greenland.
257c19bb50baf05e40f36808f3149175300a8563.headline: UK and Germany Consider NATO Deployment in Greenland Amid Tensions

f7b8ee5aeefd7836d622d19dd2d95701308f7310.summary: Israel is on high alert due to concerns about a possible US intervention in Iran, according to multiple sources. No direct action has been reported, but Israeli authorities are monitoring the situation closely.
f7b8ee5aeefd7836d622d19dd2d95701308f7310.headline: Israel on High Alert Amid Concerns of Possible US Move in Iran

251fa7a8afa5e9449fbaffdc03cf6069eed6cbb3.summary: Authorities in Victoria have declared a state of emergency as thousands of firefighters respond to bushfires that have destroyed hundreds of buildings across southeast Australia. Officials confirmed the first death related to the disaster.
251fa7a8afa5e9449fbaffdc03cf6069eed6cbb3.headline: Victoria Declares State of Emergency as Bushfires Cause Widespread

2a95cf455c8bd2fe9af9e5db48b3f04c02a734d1.summary: A gas cylinder explosion at a house in Pakistan's capital killed eight people, including the bride and groom, and injured seven others hours after a wedding celebration.
2a95cf455c8bd2fe9af9e5db48b3f04c02a734d1.headline: Gas Cylinder Explosion After Wedding in Pakistan Kills Eight

6da8586c1ba18662b697c2550c2da34f9da9d9b6.summary: Lawmakers plan to meet Thursday to review and revise draft legislation on crypto market structure, aiming to pass a comprehensive law within the year.
6da8586c1ba18662b697c2550c2da34f9da9d9b6.headline: Lawmakers to Review Draft Crypto Market Structure Legislation

99d8c06f51d46ea2dee72eb66f29fddf51b1face.summary: During the Eagles' playoff loss to the 49ers, A.J. Brown and coach Nick Sirianni had a heated sideline exchange after Brown dropped several passes. Sirianni later defended Brown and downplayed the incident.
99d8c06f51d46ea2dee72eb66f29fddf51b1face.headline: A.J. Brown and Nick Sirianni Have Heated Exchange During Eagles Loss

1e039ae6c9a8392d82385b20d39ff61391e8a32e.summary: Malaysia and Indonesia have blocked access to Elon Musk's AI chatbot Grok after authorities reported it was used to generate sexually explicit and non-consensual images of real people. The bans were implemented over the weekend following the circulation of such images on X.
1e039ae6c9a8392d82385b20d39ff61391e8a32e.headline: Malaysia and Indonesia Block Grok AI Over Explicit Image Concerns

7abcb51435d8a9826a7b6513412132e3e549ed7c.summary: The International Court of Justice is opening its first full genocide case in over a decade, focusing on allegations against Myanmar regarding the treatment of Rohingya people. Rohingya refugees in Bangladesh express hope that the proceedings will advance justice and set a precedent for future genocide cases.
7abcb51435d8a9826a7b6513412132e3e549ed7c.headline: ICJ Opens Genocide Case Against Myanmar Over Rohingya Allegations

5103b626852ca0c928eaf0acb1824430491be8e3.summary: Barcelona defeated Real Madrid 3-2 in the Spanish Super Cup final, with Raphinha scoring twice. The win marks Barcelona's second consecutive Super Cup victory over Real Madrid. Coach Hansi Flick praised his team's performance after the match held in Saudi Arabia.
5103b626852ca0c928eaf0acb1824430491be8e3.headline: Barcelona Beats Real Madrid 3 2 to Win Spanish Super Cup Final

8f6d769d5e26e684f22a836952c8a915e34d6da2.summary: At the 83rd Golden Globes held on January 12, 2026, 'Hamnet,' directed by Chloé Zhao, won Best Motion Picture, Drama. 'Sinners,' which had seven nominations, won Cinematic and Box Office Achievement and Score. The event featured appearances by Ariana Grande, Selena Gomez, and Paul Mescal, and highlighted notable red carpet fashion.
8f6d769d5e26e684f22a836952c8a915e34d6da2.headline: Hamnet Wins Best Drama at 2026 Golden Globes

d69228e21003e046ad0bf2b09ccb7f9bb969afca.summary: 'One Battle After Another' and 'Hamnet' won top awards at the 2026 Golden Globes. Timothée Chalamet received the best actor award for 'Marty Supreme.' Nikki Glaser hosted the ceremony for the second year. Warner Bros. had notable wins amid an ongoing acquisition battle involving Netflix and Paramount.
d69228e21003e046ad0bf2b09ccb7f9bb969afca.headline: One Battle After Another and Hamnet Win Top 2026 Golden Globes

78402ff7e96a269645a89640386bfaf20eb55a95.summary: The San Francisco 49ers defeated the defending Super Bowl champion Philadelphia Eagles 23-19 in the NFL playoffs' Wild Card round, coming from behind twice in the final quarter. Key plays included a late touchdown pass from Brock Purdy to Christian McCaffery and a trick play touchdown by Jauan Jennings.
78402ff7e96a269645a89640386bfaf20eb55a95.headline: 49ers Eliminate Eagles 23 19 in NFL Wild Card Comeback

410d5b5dc2a818531c1bd1dad7aa8c683dff8bcd.summary: Allegiant Travel Co. has agreed to acquire Sun Country Airlines Holdings Inc. for $1.5 billion in a cash-and-stock deal. The companies announced the merger as part of ongoing consolidation in the competitive U.S. airline industry.
410d5b5dc2a818531c1bd1dad7aa8c683dff8bcd.headline: Allegiant to Acquire Sun Country Airlines in $1.5 Billion Deal

b8e723b1aadd03c5b6519680b1509da17d205fcf.summary: Activists report that the death toll from protests in Iran has reached at least 544. President Trump stated that Iran wants to negotiate with Washington following his threat to strike Iran over its crackdown on protesters.
b8e723b1aadd03c5b6519680b1509da17d205fcf.headline: Iran Protest Death Toll Reaches 544 as Trump Cites Talks Interest

b26541245439d9a4c2c981b03dbb9d4b0a30d9e1.summary: The New England Patriots defeated the Los Angeles Chargers 16-3 in the AFC Wild Card playoff, marking their first playoff win since 2019. Quarterback Drake Maye, in his playoff debut, threw a fourth-quarter touchdown pass to Hunter Henry as the Patriots' defense limited Justin Herbert and the Chargers to just a field goal.
b26541245439d9a4c2c981b03dbb9d4b0a30d9e1.headline: Patriots Secure First Playoff Win Since 2019 With 16 3 Victory Over

7574d97aca23346eb766fb0aa97f60fac1cfe96a.summary: San Francisco 49ers tight end George Kittle suffered a torn right Achilles tendon during the playoff win over the Philadelphia Eagles. Kittle left the game in the first half, and his season is over. The 49ers advance to face Seattle in the next round.
7574d97aca23346eb766fb0aa97f60fac1cfe96a.headline: 49ers George Kittle Out for Season With Torn Achilles in Playoff Win

e6398962da4d68818b7e625f4abd24524dbc6a45.summary: India and the U.S. are continuing discussions on trade issues, with the next official call scheduled for January 13, according to statements from both sides. Sergio Gor emphasized that despite disagreements, both countries are committed to resolving differences.
e6398962da4d68818b7e625f4abd24524dbc6a45.headline: India and U.S. Set Next Trade Talks for January 13

b8307ae7d5c8f2b55ce7d00271d5b3a39ba1bb6d.summary: Green Bay Packers coach Matt LaFleur said he plans to meet with team president Ed Policy to discuss his future with the team following a major playoff loss. LaFleur stated the meeting could occur late Sunday or Monday.
b8307ae7d5c8f2b55ce7d00271d5b3a39ba1bb6d.headline: Packers Coach LaFleur to Meet With President Ed Policy About Future

2725603dfbd790223f9dbeb891e1891aa619f971.summary: The New England Patriots defeated the Los Angeles Chargers 16-3 in their wild-card playoff game during the 2025 NFL season. As a result, three-quarters of the NFL draft order will be determined by Monday morning.
2725603dfbd790223f9dbeb891e1891aa619f971.headline: Patriots Beat Chargers 16 3 in 2025 NFL Wild Card Playoff

3bc4c30e84afd88ed53d1a0e385a239d06af479d.summary: The 2025-26 NFL playoffs have begun, with the schedule and bracket set and being updated as games progress. The NFC divisional round includes a Seahawks-49ers rematch. Jalen Hurts took responsibility for the Eagles' playoff loss to the 49ers. The full playoff schedule is available, and coverage continues as the postseason advances.
3bc4c30e84afd88ed53d1a0e385a239d06af479d.headline: 2025 26 NFL Playoffs Underway With Updated Schedule and Bracket

3909c5a0338a183f9aa1c5d6c7e63a4567fc39fb.summary: A British man in his 50s was killed by an avalanche while skiing off-piste near the La Plagne resort in south-eastern France. He was found under 2.5 metres of snow after a 50-minute search. Authorities confirmed his death following recovery efforts.
3909c5a0338a183f9aa1c5d6c7e63a4567fc39fb.headline: British Skier Killed in Avalanche Near La Plagne Resort in France

3c5815882c3e1893704ea1b05f56369ff734cbe5.summary: "One Battle After Another" won major film awards and "Adolescence" received top television honors at the 83rd Golden Globe Awards held on Sunday. Stephen Graham and other cast members from "Adolescence" were among the winners.
3c5815882c3e1893704ea1b05f56369ff734cbe5.headline: One Battle After Another and Adolescence Win Big at Golden Globes

c2c0549dc128315a838b7b9add9f33a81af8033f.summary: The Buffalo Bills secured a win by intercepting Trevor Lawrence in the final minute, while New England claimed its first playoff victory since 2018 by defeating Los Angeles and sacking Justin Herbert six times.
c2c0549dc128315a838b7b9add9f33a81af8033f.headline: Bills and New England Advance With Key Defensive Plays in Playoffs

c29d72af50fad79cefb69b1854748126984facad.summary: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem announced that hundreds more federal agents will be sent to Minnesota following a fatal ICE shooting. Noem described the incident as domestic terrorism, but Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey disagreed with this characterization.
c29d72af50fad79cefb69b1854748126984facad.headline: Noem Sends More Federal Agents to Minnesota After ICE Shooting

4033727229f389e4826042b5286740073cb94ae2.summary: Police stopped and surrounded a U-Haul truck several blocks from a demonstration in support of the Iranian people after it drove down a street filled with demonstrators. The truck's side mirrors were shattered. No injuries or arrests have been reported.
4033727229f389e4826042b5286740073cb94ae2.headline: Police Stop U Haul Truck Near Demonstration Supporting Iranian People

b69aab132f840209b5e77e72518d19b24a53f8c9.summary: A suspicious object was found by the Secret Service during security sweeps ahead of Trump's arrival at Palm Beach International Airport. The discovery occurred as Trump was traveling from Mar-a-Lago. Authorities have not reported any incidents resulting from the object.
b69aab132f840209b5e77e72518d19b24a53f8c9.headline: Suspicious Object Found Before Trumps Arrival at Palm Beach Airport

cbda4acf2b7c94e18db5f1d0b06b6b3b01fab53d.summary: The UK government has paid a substantial out-of-court settlement to Guantánamo Bay detainee Abu Zubaydah, who sued over alleged British involvement in his rendition and torture. Zubaydah remains detained at the US military prison without trial.
cbda4acf2b7c94e18db5f1d0b06b6b3b01fab53d.headline: UK Settles With Guantánamo Detainee Over Torture Allegations

5292da690e56b69e6a046d1bba76d9c010f25381.summary: The UK government has launched a project called Nightfall to develop and deliver a deep-strike ballistic missile prototype for Ukraine within 12 months, aiming to support Ukraine's defense amid ongoing Russian attacks.
5292da690e56b69e6a046d1bba76d9c010f25381.headline: UK Launches Nightfall Project to Develop Ballistic Missile for Ukraine

b776999abb7530ca0db5edc033f2dfb27c86cc72.summary: A suspect has been arrested on suspicion of arson after a fire damaged the Beth Israel Congregation synagogue in Jackson, Mississippi. The fire, which broke out early Saturday, caused damage to multiple Torah scrolls. Authorities confirmed on Sunday that the incident is being investigated as arson.
b776999abb7530ca0db5edc033f2dfb27c86cc72.headline: Suspect Arrested After Arson Damages Mississippi Synagogue

ccea704b3ada25aea47a303a1eea97f3e1359f3e.summary: President Pezeshkian stated that individuals labeled as 'rioters' should not be allowed to disrupt Iranian society, emphasizing the need for stability and order.
ccea704b3ada25aea47a303a1eea97f3e1359f3e.headline: President Pezeshkian Warns Against Disruption by Rioters in Iran

3f312555aad32c38dd6cd40adc70ed1bb24db98a.summary: Xabi Alonso has left his position as Real Madrid head coach by mutual agreement after seven months in charge, following a 3-2 Super Cup final loss to Barcelona. Real Madrid announced Alvaro Arbeloa as Alonso's replacement on Monday.
3f312555aad32c38dd6cd40adc70ed1bb24db98a.headline: Xabi Alonso Departs Real Madrid

a6294b5a3b31865a72061aaf7b418b476f18c7ec.summary: Venezuela says it has released 116 prisoners as part of a gesture of national unity, though rights group Foro Penal reports a lower figure of at least 41 people freed. The Penitentiary Services Ministry stated those released were detained for disruptive acts. Rights groups note that releases have been slow and broader concerns about repression persist.
a6294b5a3b31865a72061aaf7b418b476f18c7ec.headline: Venezuela Announces Prisoner Release

7b42deb7bac3b13ad4ea7515057884b9beca14f3.summary: President Trump said Iran proposed talks on its nuclear program, as the U.S. considers possible military action in response to ongoing protests in Iran. Iran's foreign minister stated that negotiations are possible only if based on respect. Meanwhile, Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum ruled out U.S. military intervention in Mexico after security talks with Trump.
7b42deb7bac3b13ad4ea7515057884b9beca14f3.headline: Trump Reports Iran Open to Nuclear Talks as U.S. Weighs Response to

f94e9627a749cc99fa316ff8f3574e085f2aecc5.summary: Powell McCormick has been appointed to Meta's management team, where he will help guide the company's strategy and execution. Donald Trump congratulated McCormick on Truth Social following the announcement.
f94e9627a749cc99fa316ff8f3574e085f2aecc5.headline: Powell McCormick Joins Metas Management Team

8f1223891adb03fed1e5f2184844f5d920a32661.summary: Patriots cornerback Christian Gonzalez is in concussion protocol after sustaining a head injury during the team's 16-3 wild-card playoff win over the Los Angeles Chargers. Head coach Mike Vrabel announced Gonzalez's status on Monday following the game, in which Gonzalez was ruled out in the fourth quarter.
8f1223891adb03fed1e5f2184844f5d920a32661.headline: Patriots Christian Gonzalez Enters Concussion Protocol After Playoff

907eac162111f68f05d82be932ae5c9c3daeb6a4.summary: Macclesfield, after defeating FA Cup holders Crystal Palace, will host Brentford in the fourth round of the FA Cup. The draw for the last 32 pairs Macclesfield against another Premier League team as their reward for the upset win.
907eac162111f68f05d82be932ae5c9c3daeb6a4.headline: Macclesfield to Host Brentford After FA Cup Win Over Crystal Palace

3a2cb4e8264c6bef582a7b9dc22a27ead763bf9c.summary: The UN's top court is hearing a genocide case brought by Gambia against Myanmar, alleging mass killings and severe abuses of Rohingya Muslims. Gambia claims Myanmar's leadership committed brutal violations against the minority group.
3a2cb4e8264c6bef582a7b9dc22a27ead763bf9c.headline: UN Court Hears Genocide Case Against Myanmar Over Rohingya Abuses

3a037d6910f43f1379d0438e2ba28a6f0accbfa6.summary: Malaysia and Indonesia have blocked access to Elon Musk's Grok AI chatbot over concerns it was being used to generate sexually explicit and nonconsensual images. The UK's media regulator has also launched a formal investigation into the use of Grok for creating manipulated images of women and children.
3a037d6910f43f1379d0438e2ba28a6f0accbfa6.headline: Malaysia and Indonesia Block Grok AI

4324565844b398f534d052421e3d3657d0b67d21.summary: Rams quarterback Matthew Stafford sprained the index finger on his throwing hand during Los Angeles' 34-31 playoff win over the Panthers, but he is expected to play this Sunday against the Bears.
4324565844b398f534d052421e3d3657d0b67d21.headline: Rams Matthew Stafford to Play Against Bears After Finger Sprain

ee76c72357369cc2ed0b6a517ad8a08681f048ac.summary: Donald Trump stated he is inclined to block ExxonMobil from investing in Venezuela after the company's CEO described the country as 'uninvestable' in response to Trump's push for oil investment following the removal of Nicolás Maduro.
ee76c72357369cc2ed0b6a517ad8a08681f048ac.headline: Trump Says He May Block ExxonMobil From Investing in Venezuela

f2c8d550c5727ba4a064ad5f8522d5eda3e0ac1e.summary: Donald Trump announced a proposal to cap credit card interest rates at 10%, stating it would help address affordability. The plan has caused financial stocks to fall and raised concerns among banks, which say such a cap would make much of the credit card industry unprofitable. Wall Street analysts are skeptical the proposal will advance.
f2c8d550c5727ba4a064ad5f8522d5eda3e0ac1e.headline: Trump Proposes 10% Credit Card Rate Cap

5bb13ca3c44808967ad1c977bb40c2f95ffb5b30.summary: UK authorities are investigating Musk's X platform over concerns about deepfake content generated by Grok. Downing Street has threatened to leave the platform, and Starmer has called for stronger action from X to address the issue.
5bb13ca3c44808967ad1c977bb40c2f95ffb5b30.headline: UK Probes Musks X Over Grok Deepfake Concerns

62e4138f39ec1157fd8b29047d0a2b9865992259.summary: Mattel has introduced an autistic Barbie doll, developed with input from the autistic community, as part of its diversity and inclusion line. The new doll aims to reflect experiences and communication styles common among autistic people.
62e4138f39ec1157fd8b29047d0a2b9865992259.headline: Mattel Releases Autistic Barbie as Part of Diversity Line

b3eaeba8d24c027c4fbc85d45f5582b503760aac.summary: The Sporting Tribune and other outlets provided betting recommendations and predictions for January 12, 2026, including analysis of the Texans-Steelers Monday Night Football game and player performances such as Bo Bichette.
b3eaeba8d24c027c4fbc85d45f5582b503760aac.headline: Betting Picks and Predictions Offered for January 12

90f7c6dea892b5db44556151391ed2f0b762051c.summary: Nadhim Zahawi, a former Conservative chancellor, has joined Nigel Farage's Reform UK party after reportedly being denied a peerage by the Conservative Party. Zahawi is the latest former Conservative MP to defect to Reform UK.
90f7c6dea892b5db44556151391ed2f0b762051c.headline: Nadhim Zahawi Joins Reform UK After Peerage Bid Rejected

2dc28ba42190b6455bb8501de986ec93d65dfd49.summary: LeBron James will wear a special jersey patch for his 23rd NBA season, featuring a silhouette of his chalk toss and the colors of the teams he has played for. The patch will debut on Monday and remain through the end of the regular season to mark his historic achievement.
2dc28ba42190b6455bb8501de986ec93d65dfd49.headline: LeBron James to Wear Special Patch for 23rd NBA Season

a08de27cd2e79fb20be480bdb442f37ea353a56d.summary: The Saskatchewan Roughriders have signed Tevaughn Campbell and Jameer Thurman to one-year contract extensions. Campbell is signed for the 2026 season, and Thurman is under contract through 2027. Both players earned All-CFL honours last season and contributed to the team's Grey Cup victory.
a08de27cd2e79fb20be480bdb442f37ea353a56d.headline: Roughriders Extend Contracts for Campbell and Thurman

0829e828f9d8728b483f57efe33a4bc327112eeb.summary: San Francisco 49ers' George Kittle suffered a torn right Achilles tendon during the team's playoff win over the Eagles. Kittle left the game in the first half and will miss the remainder of the season. The 49ers advance to face Seattle in the next round.
0829e828f9d8728b483f57efe33a4bc327112eeb.headline: 49ers George Kittle Out for Season With Torn Achilles

2f3c7ccfc7cbfa30b2d4f7ec87038cbd37b5f0b5.summary: Warner Bros. Discovery has advised its shareholders to reject Paramount's takeover bid, following repeated recommendations from its board. Paramount Skydance continues to argue its offer is superior to Netflix's, with CEO David Ellison sending a new letter to WBD shareholders.
2f3c7ccfc7cbfa30b2d4f7ec87038cbd37b5f0b5.headline: Warner Bros. Discovery Urges Shareholders to Reject Paramount Bid

fdea83dacc45aa5b4c9b7aa5d49d083e60a5c001.summary: María Corina Machado met with the pontiff as the Holy See plays a growing role in discussions about Venezuela's future. Machado has been mostly excluded from recent US talks on the country's direction.
fdea83dacc45aa5b4c9b7aa5d49d083e60a5c001.headline: María Corina Machado Meets Pontiff Amid Vaticans Role in Venezuela

9daefe715d54aa62eb43ea92190bb1fad47d5f0d.summary: European commissioner stated that a US military takeover of Greenland would mark the end of NATO. US senator Chris Murphy called Donald Trump's threat to annex Greenland an existential crisis for NATO and criticized the president for not addressing issues like food aid and health costs.
9daefe715d54aa62eb43ea92190bb1fad47d5f0d.headline: Officials Warn US Move on Greenland Would Threaten NATOs Future

b369582f024d0077325c25dd552125c053b42772.summary: Greenland's government has rejected Donald Trump's proposal to take control of the island, emphasizing that NATO, through Denmark, is responsible for its defense. Greenland reaffirmed its status as a self-governing territory and member of NATO.
b369582f024d0077325c25dd552125c053b42772.headline: Greenland Rejects Trumps Proposal

8f8e725923dddf21b39e030c1794e79759569b6f.summary: Alphabet reached a $4 trillion valuation for the first time, surpassing Apple to become the world's second-most valuable company. The milestone followed Apple's decision to use Gemini to power Siri, boosting investor confidence in Alphabet's competitiveness in artificial intelligence.
8f8e725923dddf21b39e030c1794e79759569b6f.headline: Alphabet Surpasses Apple With $4 Trillion Valuation Milestone

8725265749bb4aa4bac22e9a4548f1cd8243589d.summary: Protests over economic issues have spread across Iran, leading to a government crackdown that has resulted in multiple deaths and an internet blackout. Authorities have escalated their response as demonstrations continue nationwide.
8725265749bb4aa4bac22e9a4548f1cd8243589d.headline: Iran Crackdown on Protests Leads to Deaths and Internet Blackout

3612b6adb47b51fa241b69725360d4b7183391d0.summary: Hundreds of people have been killed in Iran following violent protests and a strong security crackdown, according to reports. The situation remains tense amid ongoing unrest.
3612b6adb47b51fa241b69725360d4b7183391d0.headline: Hundreds Killed in Iran Amid Violent Protests and Crackdown

527289b75ef787e4575d1c6fdfb15d3b38218d3d.summary: NASA has released a new Hubble Space Telescope image showing a jet of gas from a forming star, featuring the Herbig-Haro objects HH 80/81. These objects, previously observed by Hubble in 1995, appear as bright pink and green patches in the image.
527289b75ef787e4575d1c6fdfb15d3b38218d3d.headline: NASA Releases New Hubble Image of Jet From Forming Star

c80f1a3ce468d726123257a874dd7a979b9964e9.summary: Copper prices are approaching record highs as traders increase shipments to the U.S. in anticipation of possible mineral tariffs and amid a weaker dollar, raising concerns about supply.
c80f1a3ce468d726123257a874dd7a979b9964e9.headline: Copper Prices Near Record Highs Amid Supply Concerns and Tariff Fears

bb413fed46717ca28d92adc4cb40dff9ed87748c.summary: At the awards ceremony, 'Hamnet' and 'One Battle After Another' won the top prizes, while 'KPop Demon Hunters' also gained attention. The two winning films were considered less prominent than other contenders.
bb413fed46717ca28d92adc4cb40dff9ed87748c.headline: Hamnet and One Battle After Another Win Top Film Awards

1aac1def64fe136f2f4e1a6bea94830c45392624.summary: Walmart has expanded its AI-powered shopping and checkout features by integrating with Google Gemini. This partnership allows customers to shop directly within the Gemini AI chatbot, and other retailers are also participating in the initiative.
1aac1def64fe136f2f4e1a6bea94830c45392624.headline: Walmart Integrates Shopping and Checkout With Google Gemini AI

c75e8ea0781eda421c96f017dd06033c5669d6a4.summary: Hungary has granted asylum to Zbigniew Ziobro, the former Polish justice minister. Ziobro is under investigation in Poland for alleged abuse of power and accusations of running a criminal group during his time in government.
c75e8ea0781eda421c96f017dd06033c5669d6a4.headline: Hungary Grants Asylum to Zbigniew Ziobro

7aa9fcef5f1226468364bc8b5f7112c1a6be34a0.summary: The Houston Texans defeated the Pittsburgh Steelers 30-6 in the NFL wild card round, scoring two offensive and two defensive touchdowns. The Texans advance to the Divisional Round, where they will face the Patriots. Aaron Rodgers and the Steelers were eliminated from the playoffs.
7aa9fcef5f1226468364bc8b5f7112c1a6be34a0.headline: Texans Eliminate Steelers 30 6 to Reach NFL Divisional Round

5395ecd9a9675942bc12c55e49f38a8689e959af.summary: Minnesota officials have filed a lawsuit against the federal government to stop the deployment of thousands of immigration agents to the state. The operation, described by officials as a 'federal invasion,' has led to increased immigration enforcement activities and the death of a mother of three.
5395ecd9a9675942bc12c55e49f38a8689e959af.headline: Minnesota Sues to Halt Federal Immigration Operation After Fatality

1bb0c516d7ec39f3a843970c9f584a2369a28a80.summary: Malaysia and Indonesia have blocked access to Elon Musk's Grok AI chatbot following concerns over its generation of sexually explicit and nonconsensual images. Malaysia is the second country to restrict the tool, and a British regulator has launched a formal investigation into Grok over the spread of illegal images.
1bb0c516d7ec39f3a843970c9f584a2369a28a80.headline: Malaysia and Indonesia Block Grok AI Over Sexualized Image Concerns

1beec246a3d854b85a2aa8d975168a78a87a638a.summary: James Harden scored 32 points in the Los Angeles Clippers' 117-109 win over the Charlotte Hornets, surpassing Shaquille O'Neal to become ninth on the NBA's all-time scoring list with 28,598 career points.
1beec246a3d854b85a2aa8d975168a78a87a638a.headline: James Harden Moves to Ninth on NBA All Time Scoring List

654a66d079183c0e9f3056227e05a505c67549fe.summary: Tyrese Maxey scored 33 points, including six three-pointers, and Joel Embiid added 27 points and eight rebounds as the Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Toronto Raptors 115-102. The game may have marked Kyle Lowry's final appearance in Toronto.
654a66d079183c0e9f3056227e05a505c67549fe.headline: Maxey Leads 76ers to 115 102 Win Over Raptors in Toronto

9a65783d98287b8eb563a93277123d4a09d9103d.summary: The Adelaide Writers' Week has been cancelled after numerous writers, including Jacinda Ardern, withdrew and board members resigned. The controversy began when Palestinian Australian author Randa Abdel-Fattah was removed from the lineup following criticism of her comments on Israel.
9a65783d98287b8eb563a93277123d4a09d9103d.headline: Adelaide Writers Week Cancelled After Speaker Withdrawals and

0eba80c1e175a1a8a007c35b860d17c119594558.summary: Moses Itauma's fight with Jermaine Franklin has been postponed to March 28 after Itauma suffered an injury during training.
0eba80c1e175a1a8a007c35b860d17c119594558.headline: Moses Itauma vs Jermaine Franklin Fight Postponed to March 28

860e1dc85f32c02547b5b34e7af4a87a2136164e.summary: Michael Carrick has agreed to become Manchester United's interim head coach, with Steve Holland set to join as his assistant. Wayne Rooney commented on Carrick's potential role and discussed the possibility of joining the coaching staff.
860e1dc85f32c02547b5b34e7af4a87a2136164e.headline: Michael Carrick to Become Manchester United Interim Head Coach

062e27359c45ed1418fd2b3fd2ae891aa3a538d7.summary: Iranians were able to make international calls on mobile phones on Tuesday for the first time since authorities halted communications during a crackdown on nationwide protests. Activists report at least 646 people have been killed in the unrest.
062e27359c45ed1418fd2b3fd2ae891aa3a538d7.headline: Iran Restores International Mobile Calls After Protest Crackdown

d988f49bc0548ff8d3349bf96b966d3f4827a748.summary: Australia captain Alyssa Healy will retire from all forms of cricket after the ODI and Test series against India in March, concluding a 15-year career that includes eight World Cup titles.
d988f49bc0548ff8d3349bf96b966d3f4827a748.headline: Alyssa Healy to Retire After Indias Tour in March

fb503e1ca480e3db6e0373e412a20ab6796825d4.summary: Marine Le Pen's eligibility to run for president is under review as a French appeals process begins. Jordan Bardella, leader of her party, has expressed concern over the potential consequences of a ban.
fb503e1ca480e3db6e0373e412a20ab6796825d4.headline: Appeal Begins Over Marine Le Pens Presidential Eligibility

9860b864be162746269e73f61d7b86d0e4c17264.summary: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz stated that Iran's government is nearing its end as protests continue, with nearly 650 protesters reportedly killed in the ongoing crackdown. Merz is the first G7 leader to publicly predict the collapse of the Iranian regime.
9860b864be162746269e73f61d7b86d0e4c17264.headline: German Chancellor Merz Predicts Imminent Collapse of Irans Regime

9ecc60372bbaad22e72d08e725c0e979ca0cc62b.summary: Jaylen Brown was fined $35,000 by the NBA for publicly criticizing officiating after the Celtics' 100-95 loss to the Spurs. Brown made explicit comments about the officiating following the game, leading to the disciplinary action announced on Monday.
9ecc60372bbaad22e72d08e725c0e979ca0cc62b.headline: Jaylen Brown Fined $35

b0132ffcd757a3c9b372cbdc9fbf646dceb28077.summary: Brooks Koepka has been cleared to return to the PGA Tour under a new Returning Member Program, following his recent departure from LIV Golf. He will compete in the upcoming Farmers Insurance Open and faces a financial penalty as part of his re-entry.
b0132ffcd757a3c9b372cbdc9fbf646dceb28077.headline: Brooks Koepka Rejoins PGA Tour Under New Program

d02117278aac08ec73778e55eef9803c02f54123.summary: The BBC has filed court documents seeking to dismiss Donald Trump's $10 billion defamation lawsuit, arguing that the Florida court does not have personal jurisdiction over the broadcaster. The lawsuit concerns the editing of a January 6, 2021 speech for Panorama.
d02117278aac08ec73778e55eef9803c02f54123.headline: BBC Seeks Dismissal of Trump Defamation Lawsuit in Florida Court

d833b582c647290bebe08ffff12d4fd3bd72a0d2.summary: Damien Egan, Labour MP for Bristol North East and vice chair of Labour Friends of Israel, cancelled a planned visit to a local academy in his constituency after a pro-Palestine group campaigned against his appearance.
d833b582c647290bebe08ffff12d4fd3bd72a0d2.headline: Damien Egan Cancels School Visit After Pro Palestine Campaign

1d4f7bb84358c6f710fc84e937a1707075e3928e.summary: Sen. Mark Kelly has filed a lawsuit against the Pentagon after the Trump administration moved to censure him for appearing in a video urging military personnel to refuse illegal orders.
1d4f7bb84358c6f710fc84e937a1707075e3928e.headline: Sen. Mark Kelly Sues Pentagon Over Censure for Military Video

722efc793b25db3207f02c9480a507aef9265be5.summary: Officials are debating whether the Trump administration's use of a concealed military plane in an operation against suspected drug runners violated international law, specifically regarding rules against perfidy.
722efc793b25db3207f02c9480a507aef9265be5.headline: Officials Debate Legality of Concealed Military Plane in Drug

a8fac7ddb1fa44a1b4b2296b45bc1f8f910c31b0.summary: NASA's IXPE (Imaging X-ray Polarization Explorer) has been used for the first time to study a white dwarf star. The mission observed the star EX Hya for nearly one week, focusing on its X-ray polarization and accretion disk, as illustrated in a concept image released on November 19, 2025.
a8fac7ddb1fa44a1b4b2296b45bc1f8f910c31b0.headline: NASAs IXPE Conducts First White Dwarf Star Study

3d0691438c168385e077a38a9349c9b9d808cba1.summary: A US judge has allowed work to resume on the $5 billion Revolution Wind project off Rhode Island, despite efforts by the Trump administration to block the offshore wind farm. Orsted A/S shares rose following the ruling, which permits construction to continue while legal challenges proceed.
3d0691438c168385e077a38a9349c9b9d808cba1.headline: Judge Allows Revolution Wind Project to Resume Despite Administration

e6f64a815f733800e67b37aa0fd99aa2ece4169f.summary: Thousands of nurses at several major New York City hospitals went on strike after contract negotiations failed. They were joined by elected leaders, including the city's new mayor, Zohran Mamdani.
e6f64a815f733800e67b37aa0fd99aa2ece4169f.headline: NYC Nurses Strike After Contract Talks Fail

ffdbb1f84f95265eb34b65bbd92c8a95fd4ca566.summary: The WNBA and its players' union did not reach a new collective bargaining agreement or extend the previous one by the deadline. Free agency is stalled as negotiations continue, but no player strike or owner lockout has occurred.
ffdbb1f84f95265eb34b65bbd92c8a95fd4ca566.headline: WNBA Free Agency Paused as CBA Talks Continue Without Agreement

176fdb8b21a2d0aefa03beaef1a41ea4aa291b58.summary: Nadhim Zahawi, previously a Conservative MP, was rejected for a peerage by the Conservatives after approaching Kemi Badenoch's team. Weeks later, Zahawi joined Nigel Farage's Reform UK party.
176fdb8b21a2d0aefa03beaef1a41ea4aa291b58.headline: Nadhim Zahawi Joins Reform UK After Tory Peerage Rejection

51820a68b145c7fc2c09777d7aac1697a58ce96c.summary: Republicans have criticized a Justice Department investigation involving the head of the US central bank, with backlash growing as prosecutors from the Trump administration pursue the probe. The situation has created tensions between the administration and Federal Reserve leadership.
51820a68b145c7fc2c09777d7aac1697a58ce96c.headline: Republicans Criticize Justice Probe Into US Central Bank Head

55c0e429b42ffb79b043e1d1013d64a5446bec0c.summary: Admiral Samuel Paparo stated that stable US relations with Washington have not changed Beijing's position in the region. The White House indicated the US may conduct air strikes against Iran but prefers to resolve issues diplomatically.
55c0e429b42ffb79b043e1d1013d64a5446bec0c.headline: US Considers Air Strikes on Iran

8801d88dcf490ee822ddb258b55e65fddcded88c.summary: Financial stocks declined after Trump proposed a 10% cap on credit card interest rates, raising concerns among banks that such a limit would make much of the credit card business unprofitable, particularly for customers with lower credit scores.
8801d88dcf490ee822ddb258b55e65fddcded88c.headline: Financial Stocks Drop After Trump Proposes 10% Credit Card Rate Cap

a3e4ebc12eaf9364d23e715d2145d5074808e9dd.summary: The 2026 Golden Globe Awards honored 'Hamnet' and 'One Battle After Another' with top prizes. 'KPop Demon Hunters' also gained attention during the ceremony.
a3e4ebc12eaf9364d23e715d2145d5074808e9dd.headline: Hamnet and One Battle After Another Win Top 2026 Golden Globes

5f5db556bc101b3758e1b0cb26929dbcb9b86213.summary: Trump stated he is considering excluding Exxon from operations in Venezuela after the company's CEO referred to Venezuela as 'uninvestable.' No final decision has been announced.
5f5db556bc101b3758e1b0cb26929dbcb9b86213.headline: Trump Considers Excluding Exxon From Venezuela Operations

a35c3822e4d569c68701d9ca581bc0d22cb15e38.summary: Mike Tomlin has stepped down as head coach of the Pittsburgh Steelers after 19 seasons, the team announced on Tuesday. Tomlin led the Steelers to a Super Bowl title, eight AFC North championships, and 13 playoff appearances, and never had a losing season during his tenure. The Steelers will now search for a new head coach.
a35c3822e4d569c68701d9ca581bc0d22cb15e38.headline: Mike Tomlin Steps Down as Steelers Head Coach After 19 Seasons

ffb982e867af1099b11a1442ae491bd363ff39ab.summary: Greenland's prime minister stated that Greenland chooses to maintain its relationship with Denmark and rules out joining or being governed by the United States. The announcement was made ahead of scheduled talks with U.S. and Danish officials at the White House. Both Greenlandic and Danish leaders emphasized that Greenland is not for sale.
ffb982e867af1099b11a1442ae491bd363ff39ab.headline: Greenland Affirms Ties With Denmark

476c7be97ac3cd896ecb412ed25392ff1c6cf8de.summary: The US Supreme Court heard oral arguments in cases challenging state laws that bar transgender athletes from participating in sports. Justices appeared inclined to allow these bans. Currently, 27 states have such laws, and the Court's decision could have significant effects on transgender rights nationwide.
476c7be97ac3cd896ecb412ed25392ff1c6cf8de.headline: Supreme Court Signals Support for State Bans on Transgender Athletes

d606f08641b1aee46aaabce755d82492b8e9c3c7.summary: The Arizona Diamondbacks acquired third baseman Nolan Arenado from the St. Louis Cardinals in exchange for pitching prospect Jack Martinez. St. Louis will pay $31 million of the $42 million remaining on Arenado's contract. Arenado, 34, waived his no-trade clause to complete the deal.
d606f08641b1aee46aaabce755d82492b8e9c3c7.headline: Diamondbacks Acquire Nolan Arenado From Cardinals in Trade

118e5f46980dee5f52625f0895757f932713b967.summary: The Los Angeles Chargers fired offensive coordinator Greg Roman and offensive line coach Mike Devlin on Tuesday, two days after their playoff loss to the New England Patriots. Roman had been with the team for two seasons. The changes come as the Chargers look to revamp their offense following a disappointing postseason performance.
118e5f46980dee5f52625f0895757f932713b967.headline: Chargers Fire Offensive Coordinator Greg Roman and Line Coach Mike

88402504395b6e07a264ac025b56778548ab493b.summary: Minnesota Vikings wide receiver Jordan Addison was arrested early Monday in Tampa, Florida, and charged with misdemeanor trespassing, according to police records. This follows a previous 2024 arrest on suspicion of DUI. Addison currently faces a misdemeanor trespassing charge.
88402504395b6e07a264ac025b56778548ab493b.headline: Vikings Jordan Addison Arrested in Florida on Trespassing Charge

fcd857bd5df755f49396f3876bdb48e86c1e7f90.summary: South Korean prosecutors have requested the death penalty for former president Yoon Suk Yeol, who is on trial for insurrection after attempting to declare martial law in December 2024. This marks the first insurrection trial of a Korean head of state.
fcd857bd5df755f49396f3876bdb48e86c1e7f90.headline: Prosecutors Seek Death Penalty for Yoon Suk Yeol in Insurrection Trial

9d53df63fc214434f066a51b7c74b980c3185a51.summary: Bill and Hillary Clinton have refused to comply with a House subpoena demanding their testimony in a probe related to Jeffrey Epstein. House Republicans, led by James Comer, have announced plans to pursue contempt proceedings against them for not appearing.
9d53df63fc214434f066a51b7c74b980c3185a51.headline: House Republicans Move Toward Contempt for Clintons in Epstein Probe

efac16f2192285773490fdf527ed06c983ee9383.summary: The Houston Texans defeated the Pittsburgh Steelers 30-6 in the NFL wild-card round, scoring two offensive and two defensive touchdowns, including a 50-yard interception return for a touchdown. With this win, Houston advances to the Divisional Round of the NFL playoffs.
efac16f2192285773490fdf527ed06c983ee9383.headline: Houston Texans Defeat Steelers 30 6 to Advance in NFL Playoffs

210742424aa2b2c1e444f3760f4a03cb9683a6d7.summary: Tehran has stated it is prepared for either conflict or dialogue as the US president threatens a 25 percent tariff on countries trading with Iran. The proposed tariff could impact major Iranian trading partners such as China and India. Washington is considering its response to recent protests.
210742424aa2b2c1e444f3760f4a03cb9683a6d7.headline: US Threatens Tariffs on Irans Trading Partners Amid Tensions

a5ef8e3399c8fc9cbe69066dd389ff6a2fd43b4c.summary: Manchester United have appointed Michael Carrick as head coach until the end of the season. The club confirmed the agreement on Tuesday, with Carrick, a former player, taking charge on an interim basis.
a5ef8e3399c8fc9cbe69066dd389ff6a2fd43b4c.headline: Manchester United Appoint Michael Carrick as Interim Head Coach

cb0255ed0bf6b1ff7fe457c50f9ee720f3efce5a.summary: Spanish singer Julio Iglesias has been accused of sexual assault by two former female employees, who allege inappropriate touching, insults, and humiliation. Prosecutors confirmed the accusations. Iglesias's representatives have not responded to requests for comment.
cb0255ed0bf6b1ff7fe457c50f9ee720f3efce5a.headline: Julio Iglesias Accused of Sexual Assault by Two Former Employees

0ee1f6d5f424e9c55c65608c74e3add47d04a837.summary: The Trump administration has announced it will end Temporary Protected Status for approximately 1,100 Somalis in the U.S., citing improved conditions in Somalia. Affected individuals have been given two months to leave the country or face deportation, ending their deportation relief and work permits.
0ee1f6d5f424e9c55c65608c74e3add47d04a837.headline: Trump Administration Ends Temporary Protected Status for Somalis

bc39279978b03f11b4848585c6d15447841d4913.summary: A man has been charged with arson for setting fire to the only synagogue in Jackson, Mississippi. Authorities say he targeted the building because of its Jewish affiliation and confessed the act to his father, who reported him to officials after noticing burn marks.
bc39279978b03f11b4848585c6d15447841d4913.headline: Man Charged With Arson at Jackson

ccb0c30fbc12dbdd47dc254bb10bbbfc33e9b6ba.summary: James Harden scored 32 points in the Clippers' 117-109 win over the Hornets, surpassing Shaquille O'Neal to move into ninth place on the NBA's all-time scoring list.
ccb0c30fbc12dbdd47dc254bb10bbbfc33e9b6ba.headline: James Harden Moves to Ninth on NBA All Time Scoring List

b62482395a7419cbd7d2a6c25ffda1adb914f51c.summary: Boeing delivered 600 jetliners in 2025 and secured 1,173 net orders, surpassing Airbus to achieve its first annual jet sales lead since 2018. December deliveries totaled 63 aircraft. Increased demand from countries seeking stronger ties with the Trump administration contributed to Boeing's results.
b62482395a7419cbd7d2a6c25ffda1adb914f51c.headline: Boeing Surpasses Airbus in 2025 Jet Sales and Deliveries

f318907a9415860b9fe91d457241947c59e58349.summary: Scott Adams, creator of the comic strip 'Dilbert' known for satirizing office culture, has died at age 68. His death was announced by his ex-wife during a live stream of his podcast. Adams had revealed in May that he was suffering from metastatic prostate cancer.
f318907a9415860b9fe91d457241947c59e58349.headline: Dilbert Creator Scott Adams Dies at 68

771b11aabef27db9ab090b1e07a3e4d78dcd0efa.summary: Anthony Davis will undergo likely season-ending surgery for ligament damage in his right hand, according to reports. Despite this, Dallas is reportedly exploring trade options for Davis, with the possibility he could return during the playoffs if traded to a contender. Davis responded on social media, disputing some of the reports.
771b11aabef27db9ab090b1e07a3e4d78dcd0efa.headline: Anthony Davis Faces Likely Season Ending Surgery Amid Trade Talks

d5c5c6a2eb958d3038c144f44cf9fc3c41cbafe0.summary: JPMorgan stated that all options are being considered to oppose a proposed 10% cap on credit card interest rates, which the company argues would negatively impact consumers and the economy.
d5c5c6a2eb958d3038c144f44cf9fc3c41cbafe0.headline: JPMorgan Opposes Proposed 10% Cap on Credit Card Interest Rates

1e6011545b20075e11be76d9c14fa94cf7f9d09f.summary: Keir Starmer has been offered a place on the Gaza 'peace board' established by Donald Trump as part of a ceasefire agreement between Israel and Hamas. Starmer is expected to accept, though he has not yet received a formal invitation. The board is part of a White House plan to end the conflict.
1e6011545b20075e11be76d9c14fa94cf7f9d09f.headline: Keir Starmer Offered Role on Trump Led Gaza Peace Board

a2010018fcc1516a612a3a1ed120f64ab679af45.summary: Authorities have imposed a blackout, citing concerns over misinformation, as President Yoweri Museveni seeks a seventh term in office.
a2010018fcc1516a612a3a1ed120f64ab679af45.headline: Authorities Impose Blackout as Museveni Seeks Seventh Term

252b93a0dc2199251b93330b7d614e18b6f396ea.summary: Mike Johnson criticized Donald Trump's proposal to cap credit card interest rates at 10%. Supporters say the plan could save Americans billions, while banks warn it could harm consumers.
252b93a0dc2199251b93330b7d614e18b6f396ea.headline: Mike Johnson Criticizes Trumps 10% Credit Card Interest Rate Cap

d7da1b2a816675284e10f72027181d7f391cb725.summary: An Australian writers' festival was cancelled after organizers barred a Palestinian author, citing cultural sensitivity following a mass shooting targeting Jewish Australians. Nearly 200 writers, including Jacinda Ardern, withdrew from the event in protest.
d7da1b2a816675284e10f72027181d7f391cb725.headline: Australian Writers Festival Cancelled After Author Barred

66757cd1c876d80a2fae2151ec95e951a7a2e75a.summary: Minnesota Timberwolves center Rudy Gobert has been suspended for one game due to accumulating multiple flagrant fouls this season. He will serve the suspension on Tuesday when the Timberwolves play the Milwaukee Bucks.
66757cd1c876d80a2fae2151ec95e951a7a2e75a.headline: Timberwolves Rudy Gobert Suspended One Game for Flagrant Fouls

a09152a5a8bc3d2e993a4f90c98a34eff637d926.summary: Donald Trump criticized Jerome Powell, calling him 'incompetent' or 'crooked,' and said Powell 'will be gone soon.' JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon defended the Federal Reserve's independence as Powell faces a DOJ probe supported by some Republicans.
a09152a5a8bc3d2e993a4f90c98a34eff637d926.headline: Trump Criticizes Powell as DOJ Probes Fed Chair

1f3f456e60b06f310f1591e3b9407f4abc7087ef.summary: Global central bankers have publicly expressed support for U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell after a criminal investigation was launched into his actions. A joint statement released Tuesday emphasized their solidarity with Powell.
1f3f456e60b06f310f1591e3b9407f4abc7087ef.headline: Global Central Bankers Back Powell Amid Criminal Investigation

98ebbbb1496f2ebe8fe825954e2854f0e5484e35.summary: Inuit advocacy groups and Greenlanders in Canada have voiced strong opposition to any potential US takeover of Greenland, expressing frustration over being treated as geopolitical pawns.
98ebbbb1496f2ebe8fe825954e2854f0e5484e35.headline: Inuit Groups Oppose Potential US Takeover of Greenland

6d99d8a5ba6abd922e5774e4809f0a88b0caf235.summary: At least four federal prosecutors have resigned from the Justice Department, citing concerns over the department's focus on investigating Renee Good's ties to protest groups and its decision not to investigate her fatal shooting by an ICE officer last week.
6d99d8a5ba6abd922e5774e4809f0a88b0caf235.headline: Prosecutors Resign Over Justice Department Actions in Renee Good Case

c00a55eb68d5a99e8c218d15aba7cd4039d6d908.summary: NASA's Hubble Space Telescope has captured a new image of the star-forming region NGC 1333, showing a variety of young stellar objects. The image highlights a protostar illuminating nearby gas and dust, creating a reflection nebula.
c00a55eb68d5a99e8c218d15aba7cd4039d6d908.headline: Hubble Captures New Image of Young Stars in NGC 1333

f182aeb97a4262f70300d1ad1b57aa386b02d025.summary: The Pentagon has started integrating Musk's Grok AI chatbot into its military networks, despite global criticism and concerns. The move marks a significant step in the adoption of AI technologies within U.S. defense systems.
f182aeb97a4262f70300d1ad1b57aa386b02d025.headline: Pentagon Adopts Musks Grok AI Chatbot Amid Global Criticism

e8f9161848c9b14e2815421a33cfc6d8065da105.summary: Mike Tomlin has stepped down as head coach of the Pittsburgh Steelers after 19 seasons. The decision comes following the team's playoff defeat by the Houston Texans. Tomlin leaves with a record that includes a Super Bowl win and no losing seasons. The Steelers are now beginning their first head coach search since 2007.
e8f9161848c9b14e2815421a33cfc6d8065da105.headline: Mike Tomlin Steps Down as Steelers Head Coach After 19 Seasons

81d5d5f4d2a060a8da2774b7a5b4ff233325bf7b.summary: A construction crane collapsed onto a moving passenger train in northeastern Thailand on January 14, 2026, causing the train to derail and briefly catch fire. At least 29 people were killed and 64 others injured. The crane was part of a high-speed rail project, and nearly 200 people were on board the train at the time of the accident.
81d5d5f4d2a060a8da2774b7a5b4ff233325bf7b.headline: Crane Collapse on Train in Thailand Kills 29

cf2a9b49c337eb02ea9291e820bf6f8178997345.summary: South Korean prosecutors have requested the death penalty for former president Yoon Suk Yeol, who is on trial for insurrection charges related to his failed attempt to impose martial law in December 2024. The verdict is expected next month. If sentenced to death, it would mark South Korea's first execution in nearly 30 years.
cf2a9b49c337eb02ea9291e820bf6f8178997345.headline: Prosecutors Seek Death Penalty for Yoon Suk Yeol in Insurrection Trial

520e92b5d5d18cbeeeeebe7d620010e8b8d0a7de.summary: Saks Global, the parent company of Saks Fifth Avenue, Neiman Marcus, and Bergdorf Goodman, filed for bankruptcy protection after struggling with high debt from its $2.7 billion merger last year. CEO Baker is set to leave the company. The filing marks one of the largest retail collapses since the pandemic and raises uncertainty about the future of US luxury fashion.
520e92b5d5d18cbeeeeebe7d620010e8b8d0a7de.headline: Saks Global Files for Bankruptcy Following Debt From Major Merger

c27db4dc510904325f82178cdadd100d217a2b9a.summary: Claudette Colvin, whose 1955 arrest for refusing to give up her seat on a segregated Montgomery bus helped spark the modern civil rights movement, has died at age 86.
c27db4dc510904325f82178cdadd100d217a2b9a.headline: Civil Rights Figure Claudette Colvin Dies at 86

49e540ef65e0ae283ad64504fdec3e698aa28180.summary: Iran's judiciary announced plans for swift trials and executions of detained protesters, despite warnings from the US. The reported death toll from the unrest has risen into the thousands. Some mobile phone call services have been restored in Iran, but texting and internet access remain limited.
49e540ef65e0ae283ad64504fdec3e698aa28180.headline: Iran Plans Fast Trials

443eac45a2c40f3befc51aac36be56bba5ccd959.summary: Greenland's prime minister stated that Greenland chooses Denmark and will not be governed by the US, ahead of a high-stakes meeting at the White House involving Denmark, Greenland, and Vance. The statement comes amid tensions over US efforts to take control of Greenland.
443eac45a2c40f3befc51aac36be56bba5ccd959.headline: Greenland Affirms Ties to Denmark Before White House Meeting

12f2973ada11f45d509390c81fe8cbf52284c3e1.summary: Manchester United have appointed Michael Carrick as head coach until the end of the season. The club's leadership chose Carrick to lead the team on an interim basis, aiming to reconnect with their coaching philosophy.
12f2973ada11f45d509390c81fe8cbf52284c3e1.headline: Michael Carrick Appointed Manchester United Head Coach Until Season

b482378048554d5aff6580333cea9dbc1fdc7301.summary: EU and US climate scientists report that 2025 was the third hottest year on record. Global average temperatures from 2023 to 2025 surpassed the 1.5°C threshold set in the Paris Agreement, and many regions experienced severe heatwaves. Experts do not expect relief from high temperatures in 2026.
b482378048554d5aff6580333cea9dbc1fdc7301.headline: 2025 Confirmed as Third Hottest Year Globally

e6f2232e2c34273a070517a4d09636a3923f4977.summary: Mike Johnson criticized Donald Trump's proposal to cap credit card interest rates at 10%. Major banks, including JPMorgan Chase, have opposed the plan, warning it could harm the $70 billion credit card market and negatively impact consumers and the economy. Financial firms are considering various options to challenge the proposal.
e6f2232e2c34273a070517a4d09636a3923f4977.headline: Banks and Lawmakers Push Back on Trumps 10% Credit Card Rate Cap

b0e26be71b8ce6136049c10f9d2e9e8492314c70.summary: Bill and Hillary Clinton have refused to comply with a House Republican subpoena related to the Epstein investigation. The House GOP is moving forward with contempt proceedings against them for not testifying.
b0e26be71b8ce6136049c10f9d2e9e8492314c70.headline: Bill and Hillary Clinton Face Contempt Move After Refusing House

27318a235ab82556c0c3ba9296580f17d23ae06c.summary: Alvaro Arbeloa has been appointed as Real Madrid's new head coach following Xabi Alonso's departure after a defeat to Barcelona. Arbeloa will lead the team for the first time in the Copa del Rey Round of 16 match against Albacete, with two players set to miss the game.
27318a235ab82556c0c3ba9296580f17d23ae06c.headline: Arbeloa Debuts as Real Madrid Coach in Copa del Rey After Alonso

ed18eddfb5e562229d65aae901dea7b96068c93e.summary: Emma Raducanu defeated Camila Osorio 6-3, 7-6 in the first round of the Hobart International, securing her first win of the season after their rain-delayed match was completed on Tuesday.
ed18eddfb5e562229d65aae901dea7b96068c93e.headline: Emma Raducanu Wins Rain Delayed Hobart International Opener

11e0e06dad79069f61ca0cd3547fba5ccd1904f0.summary: Netflix is preparing to amend its accepted offer for Warner Bros Discovery's studios and streaming businesses to an all-cash bid, replacing the stock component due to its decreased value. The move aims to accelerate the acquisition process and counter a competing bid from Paramount.
11e0e06dad79069f61ca0cd3547fba5ccd1904f0.headline: Netflix Plans All Cash Offer to Acquire Warner Bros Discovery Assets

398f867520493f0905a67e2894ed184fdd2c04a0.summary: Actor Kiefer Sutherland was arrested in Hollywood early Monday on suspicion of assaulting a ride-hail driver, according to Los Angeles police. Officers responded to a call shortly after midnight and took Sutherland into custody. The incident remains under investigation.
398f867520493f0905a67e2894ed184fdd2c04a0.headline: Kiefer Sutherland Arrested in Hollywood on Suspicion of Assault

a8329907375405107e269a0b8517868067d4c287.summary: Activists report that over 2,500 people have died during nationwide protests in Iran over the past 17 days. Other sources confirm at least 2,000 deaths as demonstrations continue.
a8329907375405107e269a0b8517868067d4c287.headline: Over 2500 Reported Dead in Iran Protests Activists Say

ae69d8f1251f879cb812c8109aeddbbfc776965c.summary: U.S. Vice President JD Vance will meet with Denmark's foreign minister and Greenland's foreign minister at the White House on Wednesday to discuss issues related to Greenland, marking the first such meeting since President Trump's remarks about acquiring the island.
ae69d8f1251f879cb812c8109aeddbbfc776965c.headline: U.S. Denmark and Greenland Officials to Meet at White House

9a2f8c89bd2a25437a87d39121d73ef3deff0e06.summary: The Arizona Diamondbacks acquired third baseman Nolan Arenado from the St. Louis Cardinals in exchange for minor league pitcher Jack Martinez and cash. The Cardinals will pay $31 million of the $42 million remaining on Arenado's contract over the next two seasons. Arenado waived his no-trade clause to complete the deal.
9a2f8c89bd2a25437a87d39121d73ef3deff0e06.headline: Diamondbacks Acquire Nolan Arenado From Cardinals in Trade

ee0d20f744059ed2f0d17a8181b7ee0bc0268d87.summary: Venezuela has released an unspecified number of U.S. citizens following President Nicolás Maduro's capture. The U.S. State Department described the action as a positive development but did not confirm the identities or total number of those freed.
ee0d20f744059ed2f0d17a8181b7ee0bc0268d87.headline: Venezuela Releases Unspecified Number of U.S. Citizens After Maduro

104f81dcf2c59c3e6f85b847e23d6749f233a372.summary: A bipartisan group of US senators has introduced a long-awaited bill to establish clear rules for the cryptocurrency market. The bill also includes a provision barring funding for any action to occupy or annex territory belonging to a NATO member state.
104f81dcf2c59c3e6f85b847e23d6749f233a372.headline: Senators Unveil Bipartisan Bill on Crypto Rules and NATO Protections

6065e244bf344dae0c2bd9b5b2aedb7f3a7ceadb.summary: The French foreign minister stated that Iran's current crackdown could be the most violent in its contemporary history.
6065e244bf344dae0c2bd9b5b2aedb7f3a7ceadb.headline: French Foreign Minister Warns of Extreme Violence in Iran Crackdown

a71735d896269788dacdeec485e4692d5354bb15.summary: Manchester City are preparing an offer for Crystal Palace defender Marc Guéhi, while Bayern Munich is also showing interest. N'Golo Kanté is nearing a return to Europe, and Marcus Rashford will not be returning to Manchester United.
a71735d896269788dacdeec485e4692d5354bb15.headline: Manchester City Target Marc Guéhi

c27f330d6fffadfb27072c324c03df6db2e1efb4.summary: Israel Adesanya is scheduled to fight Joe Pyfer in Seattle, Washington on March 28, marking his return after over a year. The event will also feature a women's flyweight rematch between Maycee Barber and Alexa Grasso.
c27f330d6fffadfb27072c324c03df6db2e1efb4.headline: Adesanya to Face Pyfer in March 28 UFC Return in Seattle

de56aeba92015421c73d729f3313ad86124291bc.summary: Tiger Woods praised Brooks Koepka's return to the PGA Tour through the Returning Member Program, calling it positive for the tour. Woods also provided an update on his own rehab from a back injury and discussed his outlook for the season.
de56aeba92015421c73d729f3313ad86124291bc.headline: Tiger Woods Welcomes Brooks Koepkas Return to PGA Tour

19b9a1fea1216e03064eb1a0c4534994d447dd64.summary: A Chinese app designed for people living alone has gone viral, attracting widespread attention for its focus on solitary lifestyles.
19b9a1fea1216e03064eb1a0c4534994d447dd64.headline: Chinese App for Solitary Living Gains Viral Popularity

c5c9c9848019f8894ce3a20329407345e8ee703e.summary: David Webb, a prominent activist investor known for advocating corporate governance reform and greater transparency in Hong Kong's financial markets, has died at age 60. Webb was recognized for his efforts to protect minority shareholders and highlight questionable business practices.
c5c9c9848019f8894ce3a20329407345e8ee703e.headline: Activist Investor David Webb Dies at 60

22d52e7f5278553c1fd2919e67a2fb5bdc7e1c51.summary: Scott Adams, creator of the 'Dilbert' comic strip known for satirizing office life, has died at age 68. 'Dilbert' was widely published and became a defining workplace comic in the 1990s and 2000s.
22d52e7f5278553c1fd2919e67a2fb5bdc7e1c51.headline: Dilbert Creator Scott Adams Dies at 68

692b2dddc9b4a8eea66d15b7a441f22b12c0da9f.summary: The Africa Cup of Nations (CAN 2025) has reached the semi-final stage, with four teams remaining in the competition as of January 14, 2026.
692b2dddc9b4a8eea66d15b7a441f22b12c0da9f.headline: Africa Cup of Nations Reaches Semi Finals with Four Teams Left

8d1380dec43121e9783399718d81e4293a596e97.summary: Jared Kushner and Steven Witkoff are planning a visit to Moscow to meet with Vladimir Putin, according to Bloomberg News reports.
8d1380dec43121e9783399718d81e4293a596e97.headline: Kushner and Witkoff Plan Moscow Visit for Putin Meeting

949739a76860aa9b3017619ee64c0a417cda78f1.summary: The Justice Department announced there is no basis for a criminal or civil rights investigation into the recent ICE shooting in Minneapolis, according to officials.
949739a76860aa9b3017619ee64c0a417cda78f1.headline: DOJ Finds No Basis for Investigation in Minneapolis ICE Shooting

7c089450f368039fc222a79ae4aaee50aeca4c6d.summary: The US has announced the start of phase two of its Gaza plan, which includes a ceasefire, the creation of a committee of Palestinian technocrats to manage Gaza, and steps toward reconstruction and demilitarization. No details have been given about the members of the new committee.
7c089450f368039fc222a79ae4aaee50aeca4c6d.headline: US Launches Phase Two of Gaza Plan With Technocratic Committee

244fadd5379cf530cf71fbeb0bbdeeeeeae97334.summary: Quebec Premier François Legault has announced his resignation as leader of the province ahead of the upcoming fall election, following months of turmoil within the Coalition Avenir Québec. His departure comes as separatist opponents gain momentum in polls.
244fadd5379cf530cf71fbeb0bbdeeeeeae97334.headline: Quebec Premier François Legault Resigns Ahead of Fall Election

57224584faee850521571659c726163f95c47e89.summary: The United States has begun withdrawing some personnel and equipment from Middle East bases, including al-Udeid Air Base in Qatar, following an Iranian warning of retaliation if Washington launches strikes against Iran. Tehran has told neighboring countries it would target US bases in response to any US intervention.
57224584faee850521571659c726163f95c47e89.headline: US Withdraws Personnel From Middle East Bases Amid Iranian Threats

199b265b5faf1606036678e6789af812d75c49a1.summary: The U.S. State Department announced it will suspend immigrant visa processing for citizens of 75 countries, including Afghanistan, Iran, Russia, Somalia, and Brazil. The suspension, effective immediately, is based on concerns that applicants from these countries are likely to require public assistance while in the United States.
199b265b5faf1606036678e6789af812d75c49a1.headline: US Suspends Immigrant Visa Processing for 75 Countries Citing Welfare

40efe07eb3065274bb31e992998f03d80c1360a7.summary: A construction crane being used for a high-speed rail project collapsed onto a moving passenger train northeast of Bangkok, Thailand, on January 14, 2026. The accident killed more than 30 people and injured dozens. The train, carrying nearly 200 people, derailed and caught fire after the impact, according to Thai officials.
40efe07eb3065274bb31e992998f03d80c1360a7.headline: Crane Collapse on Train in Thailand Kills Over 30

7d0f759a0f33cdb78b2dff26e1ef75474ab23a7a.summary: Mike Tomlin stepped down as head coach of the Pittsburgh Steelers on Tuesday after 19 seasons. Tomlin, 53, leaves with a record of never having a losing season but lost his last seven playoff games. Steelers owner Art Rooney II said he was willing to continue with Tomlin, but Tomlin chose to step away. Tomlin does not plan to coach during the 2026 season.
7d0f759a0f33cdb78b2dff26e1ef75474ab23a7a.headline: Mike Tomlin Steps Down as Steelers Coach After 19 Seasons

c2d85c2e76f0e69f8326dbc68ca2f1566391d6b3.summary: The Boston Red Sox have agreed to a five-year, $130 million contract with left-handed pitcher Ranger Suárez, according to multiple reports. Suárez, who became an All-Star in 2024, leaves the Philadelphia Phillies after eight seasons with the team.
c2d85c2e76f0e69f8326dbc68ca2f1566391d6b3.headline: Red Sox Sign Ranger Suárez to Five Year

ca1e2b5b8744701140f1471c87f17c8be88cbf0c.summary: On January 14, 2026, the FBI searched the Virginia home and seized devices belonging to Washington Post reporter Hannah Natanson. The search was conducted as part of a classified documents investigation related to Aurelio Perez-Lugones. The FBI confirmed the action was tied to a national security probe.
ca1e2b5b8744701140f1471c87f17c8be88cbf0c.headline: FBI Searches Washington Post Reporters Home in Classified Documents

5abac7d55efa8cacda4d5592a86ef92f0527bc7a.summary: France's interior ministry has banned 10 British members of the Raise the Colours group from entering the country, citing concerns over anti-migrant activities and potential public disorder. Officials said the activists' actions were likely to incite violence or hatred.
5abac7d55efa8cacda4d5592a86ef92f0527bc7a.headline: France Bans 10 British Raise the Colours Activists Over Anti Migrant

dcb10cb969003b39385a93075de4f424022df633.summary: Top officials from Denmark and Greenland met with U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio at the White House to discuss Greenland's status, following provocative statements by the president. The meeting was requested by Danish and Greenlandic diplomats amid heightened tensions.
dcb10cb969003b39385a93075de4f424022df633.headline: Denmark and Greenland Hold White House Talks With U.S. on Greenland

881c18e4dabc42d5971a88ae515a4492bb265883.summary: Shaun Wane has resigned as England rugby league head coach after six years in charge. His departure comes less than a year before the Rugby League World Cup, leaving England searching for a new coach ahead of the tournament.
881c18e4dabc42d5971a88ae515a4492bb265883.headline: Shaun Wane Resigns as England Rugby League Head Coach

fdcafc8b38f401edf849ba928ef05bba7da837b4.summary: Verizon experienced a nationwide service outage affecting at least 175,000 customers as of Wednesday afternoon. The company stated it was working to resolve the issue after widespread interruptions were reported.
fdcafc8b38f401edf849ba928ef05bba7da837b4.headline: Verizon Service Outage Affects Over 175

734c9b2192a035013d0b69cdf72dee573430ec9e.summary: The Senate is preparing to vote on a measure regarding Venezuela war powers, while the Trump administration is pressuring Republican senators to oppose it.
734c9b2192a035013d0b69cdf72dee573430ec9e.headline: Senate Set for Venezuela War Powers Vote Amid Trump Pushback

6546e3c3e903217aeb52d3d1a8c58b9f46049781.summary: After talks with US officials, Denmark stated a 'fundamental disagreement' remains with the US regarding Greenland. Danish official Lars Lokke Rasmussen emphasized rejecting any proposals that do not respect Greenland's right to self-determination. The disagreement follows discussions with the Trump administration.
6546e3c3e903217aeb52d3d1a8c58b9f46049781.headline: Denmark Maintains Disagreement With US Over Greenlands Status

a5557eb7160fe106164ff6022bfa34f7f2234c00.summary: Oregon quarterback Dante Moore, previously projected as a top pick in the 2026 NFL draft, has announced he will return to the Ducks for the 2026 season instead of entering the draft. Moore made the announcement on ESPN's SportsCenter.
a5557eb7160fe106164ff6022bfa34f7f2234c00.headline: Oregon QB Dante Moore to Return for 2026 Season

b170ab5affd8e3c20b628054845cadf38f944635.summary: The U.S. has begun evacuating troops from some Middle East bases and advised some personnel to leave a military base in Qatar. Officials describe the move as a precaution as Donald Trump considers possible action against Iran.
b170ab5affd8e3c20b628054845cadf38f944635.headline: U.S. Evacuates Troops from Middle East Bases Amid Iran Tensions

9a9877aa4c59424435ca10d8c37b13db71aab91a.summary: The Charlotte Hornets will retire Dell Curry's No. 30 jersey on March 19, honoring the 16-year NBA veteran and longtime team member.
9a9877aa4c59424435ca10d8c37b13db71aab91a.headline: Charlotte Hornets to Retire Dell Currys Jersey on March 19

59b8caaab2361ce572f5d25570fc939b75065b1b.summary: The Memphis Grizzlies announced that Zach Edey will remain sidelined for at least six more weeks as he continues to recover from a stress reaction in his left ankle. Edey has not played since December 7 and will be reevaluated after completing his current rehabilitation plan.
59b8caaab2361ce572f5d25570fc939b75065b1b.headline: Zach Edey Out at Least Six More Weeks With Ankle Injury

39b45582b48f96d3ff95fd24f90c7d27f63f29fd.summary: Over 2,400 protesters have been killed in Iran during a violent crackdown by security forces, according to reports. The unrest marks the country's largest uprising in decades, with information limited due to a widespread communications blackout.
39b45582b48f96d3ff95fd24f90c7d27f63f29fd.headline: Over 2400 Protesters Killed in Iran Amid Widespread Crackdown

89065def8af12ba60565294d7e863e7402a4873c.summary: Home secretary Shabana Mahmood stated she has lost confidence in West Midlands chief constable Craig Guildford after a report found intelligence used to ban Israeli fans was exaggerated or untrue. Mahmood pledged to restore central government power to dismiss chief constables. West Midlands Police apologized for errors but did not comment on Guildford's position.
89065def8af12ba60565294d7e863e7402a4873c.headline: Home Secretary Loses Confidence in West Midlands Chief Constable

282b5ec3c5f0d6ecbd23eae23671dc88b30e92c6.summary: The US Supreme Court did not issue a ruling on President Trump's tariffs as of January 14, 2026. The decision on the legality of the tariffs under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act remains pending.
282b5ec3c5f0d6ecbd23eae23671dc88b30e92c6.headline: Supreme Court Delays Ruling on Trumps Tariffs

80f0642393bad7f42a27a94e7a78308cd0c33ee7.summary: South Korean prosecutors have requested the death penalty for former president Yoon Suk Yeol, who is on trial for insurrection after his failed attempt to impose martial law in December 2024. The verdict in Yoon's case is expected next month.
80f0642393bad7f42a27a94e7a78308cd0c33ee7.headline: Prosecutors Seek Death Penalty for Yoon Suk Yeol in Insurrection Trial
