d7961370b5f0d83fc84608964dcd8752edf7f5af.summary: Venezuela's acting president has announced the release of some political prisoners, describing it as a sign of political change. However, NGOs report that nearly 1,000 political prisoners remain detained, and the government has not specified who will be released or when.
d7961370b5f0d83fc84608964dcd8752edf7f5af.headline: Venezuela Releases Some Political Prisoners

6de0cf0603b548c7d6142786188a840b87f47308.summary: Adam Thielen announced his retirement from the NFL after a 13-year career. Thielen played for the Vikings, Panthers, and Steelers before making the announcement on Wednesday.
6de0cf0603b548c7d6142786188a840b87f47308.headline: Adam Thielen Announces Retirement After 13 Year NFL Career

529d071ba72022e68242793adece0a28d75dad1f.summary: Saks Global, owner of Neiman Marcus and Bergdorf Goodman, has filed for bankruptcy protection after financial difficulties following its acquisition of Neiman Marcus led to a cash shortfall.
529d071ba72022e68242793adece0a28d75dad1f.headline: Saks Global Files for Bankruptcy After Neiman Marcus Acquisition

8ba26d2c8fd53b2ecb9c96f26c0672c67970bcbd.summary: Germany will send reconnaissance troops to Greenland at Denmark's request to assess potential military contributions for regional security, according to a statement from the German defence ministry.
8ba26d2c8fd53b2ecb9c96f26c0672c67970bcbd.headline: Germany to Deploy Reconnaissance Troops to Greenland at Denmarks

d09296db475346cb9685ed8903f99dcdc4d2683a.summary: The CFL rules committee has proposed eliminating tie games in the regular season. Under the proposal, if a game remains tied after two overtime rounds, teams would alternate plays from the opponent’s three-yard line until one team scores and the other does not, ensuring a winner is decided.
d09296db475346cb9685ed8903f99dcdc4d2683a.headline: CFL Proposes Rule to Eliminate Tie Games in Regular Season

85edf55af58839b2be02b5289d4a6958a15bfe50.summary: Denmark, the US, and a third government held their first official talks in Washington regarding President Trump's proposal to acquire Greenland. The discussions, involving JD Vance and Marco Rubio, were described as frank but constructive and lasted nearly an hour. The Danish embassy is set to brief journalists on the results of the negotiations.
85edf55af58839b2be02b5289d4a6958a15bfe50.headline: US Denmark Hold First Official Talks on Trumps Greenland Proposal

43231a6f810db5f09c7c3f8618dbce73b22f4de8.summary: On January 14, 2026, the Trump administration canceled up to $1.9 billion in federal grants for mental health and substance use services. The termination affects up to 2,800 grantees, with funding ending immediately and providers warning of impacts on thousands seeking help and in recovery.
43231a6f810db5f09c7c3f8618dbce73b22f4de8.headline: Trump Administration Cancels $1.9 Billion in Mental Health Grant

188e19e0e53ccbc97f0983ffdafc2ad674764058.summary: Elon Musk stated he was unaware that Grok, an AI tool, generated explicit images of minors. In response, Democratic lawmakers in the US urged Apple and Google to remove X from their app stores.
188e19e0e53ccbc97f0983ffdafc2ad674764058.headline: Lawmakers Urge Apple and Google to Remove X After Grok AI Incident

6dbcfdd9d2fb74709842321c6964a7b9bc0b4c7b.summary: A photo taken from the International Space Station at 3:29 a.m. on December 20, 2025, shows the New York–Newark–Jersey City metropolitan area, which covers 23 counties in New York, New Jersey, and Connecticut and has a population of about 19.9 million.
6dbcfdd9d2fb74709842321c6964a7b9bc0b4c7b.headline: ISS Captures Nighttime Image of New York Metro Area in December 2025

97392bbb2cba70d28385e07b063e873ddd846771.summary: A construction crane collapsed onto a passenger train northeast of Bangkok, killing at least 32 people and injuring dozens, according to Thai officials. The train was carrying nearly 200 passengers. The incident followed a separate crane collapse outside Bangkok that killed two people the previous day.
97392bbb2cba70d28385e07b063e873ddd846771.headline: Crane Collapse on Thai Train Kills at Least 32

38cfecff9bfe24f70b06728af32705272a295a68.summary: The U.S. State Department announced it will suspend processing immigrant visas for citizens of 75 countries, including Afghanistan, Iran, Russia, and Somalia, due to concerns they may rely on public assistance. The suspension takes effect January 21, 2026, and does not affect visitors or short-term visa holders.
38cfecff9bfe24f70b06728af32705272a295a68.headline: U.S. to Suspend Immigrant Visas for 75 Countries Starting January 21

77124a057e8ee254c7f4bce6c8a4ddf4b76ca821.summary: Elon Musk’s X has disabled its Grok AI feature from generating or editing sexualized images of real people, following criticism and legal concerns. The UK government claims vindication for its earlier stance, and Musk has pledged to comply with laws in all markets.
77124a057e8ee254c7f4bce6c8a4ddf4b76ca821.headline: X Disables Grok AI Feature for Creating Sexualized Images of Real

e2b3b956478045f49ee4234df18ee30295ba01c1.summary: The New York Giants are finalizing a deal to hire John Harbaugh as their next head coach, with contract negotiations underway and an official announcement expected soon. Harbaugh interviewed with the team on Wednesday and is expected to accept the position, according to multiple reports.
e2b3b956478045f49ee4234df18ee30295ba01c1.headline: Giants Finalizing Deal to Hire John Harbaugh as Head Coach

555ed706a9bf84c5b3979c467fd1ec8aeb740c45.summary: Donald Trump stated that Iran has stopped killing protesters, but Iranian authorities have indicated that executions may still proceed. The U.S. has not ruled out military action, with personnel evacuated from a Qatar command center and increased military precautions amid ongoing concerns over Iran's response to protests.
555ed706a9bf84c5b3979c467fd1ec8aeb740c45.headline: Trump Says Iran Halted Protester Killings as U.S. Weighs Military

f5e689c61ecc6c885bf394715a14c286a44849c0.summary: The UK economy grew by 0.3% in November 2025, outperforming expectations and rebounding from the previous month's contraction. Growth was driven by a recovery in car production, particularly at Jaguar Land Rover, and strength in the services sector, according to official figures.
f5e689c61ecc6c885bf394715a14c286a44849c0.headline: UK Economy Grows 0.3% in November

0ae8652921b4fa7dc75d812b49f22d9ac253bea8.summary: Talks between Denmark, Greenland, and U.S. officials in Washington ended without a breakthrough, as a Danish official stated that a 'fundamental disagreement' over Greenland remains. Despite this, the parties agreed to form a high-level working group to address ongoing differences, while President Trump reaffirmed his interest in acquiring Greenland.
0ae8652921b4fa7dc75d812b49f22d9ac253bea8.headline: Denmark and U.S. Remain at Odds Over Greenland After Washington Talks

e8bac081d28aafe12fa6c80c341b2cce5bb92233.summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is set to declare a state of emergency in the country's energy sector after Russian attacks severely disrupted power and heating, as temperatures fall to nearly -20°C. The government faces challenges with energy shortages and military conscription amid ongoing conflict.
e8bac081d28aafe12fa6c80c341b2cce5bb92233.headline: Ukraine to Declare Energy Emergency After Russian Attacks Disrupt

ffaf07f93c6d73fb47292616df544a8a27a139cc.summary: Russia has expelled an unnamed British diplomat, accusing the individual of spying. The Russian foreign ministry stated the diplomat has been stripped of accreditation and must leave the country within two weeks.
ffaf07f93c6d73fb47292616df544a8a27a139cc.headline: Russia Expels British Diplomat Over Alleged Spying

0ff725d1e4a470492c017228bc605b3d861acaea.summary: The White House announced the start of the second phase of the Gaza ceasefire, which includes forming a committee of Palestinian technocrats to oversee day-to-day administration and begin demilitarization and reconstruction efforts. Details on the committee members have not been provided.
0ff725d1e4a470492c017228bc605b3d861acaea.headline: White House Launches Next Phase of Gaza Ceasefire With New Committee

b03e1755ef07e518da3475cfdd418b887bdfff7f.summary: A U.S. federal immigration officer shot a Venezuelan man in the leg during an enforcement operation in Minneapolis after the man reportedly attacked the officer with a shovel and broom handle. Authorities state the officer acted in self-defense. The incident has sparked protests amid ongoing tensions in the city following the recent fatal shooting of Renee Nicole Good.
b03e1755ef07e518da3475cfdd418b887bdfff7f.headline: Federal Officer Shoots Man in Minneapolis

1a64074d7f45514ced8a2d7942948e0ac8421cfd.summary: Four astronauts returned to Earth from the International Space Station after a crew member required medical treatment, marking the first medical evacuation in the station's history. NASA reports the affected astronaut is in stable condition. The mission ended about a month early, with the crew splashing down in the Pacific Ocean on Thursday.
1a64074d7f45514ced8a2d7942948e0ac8421cfd.headline: NASA Returns Four Astronauts Early in First ISS Medical Evacuation

1995f59c0c7361bf237cb2507f80eb0abf03bc2b.summary: Dallas Mavericks rookie Cooper Flagg twisted his left ankle for the second consecutive game and was ruled out for the remainder of Wednesday's game against the Denver Nuggets. Flagg did not play in the second half.
1995f59c0c7361bf237cb2507f80eb0abf03bc2b.headline: Mavericks Cooper Flagg Exits Game With Ankle Injury

34e2ba5e70d00a7d95759ac6061aba6bf83e7587.summary: Jalen Brunson of the Knicks suffered a right ankle injury in the first quarter of Wednesday's game against the Sacramento Kings and did not return, according to the team.
34e2ba5e70d00a7d95759ac6061aba6bf83e7587.headline: Jalen Brunson Leaves Knicks Game Early With Ankle Injury

5c82361ebaecbc19418a3e28e03c515e4cd93e1e.summary: The Commanders have hired D.J. Williams, son of franchise legend Doug Williams, as their new quarterbacks coach. Williams joins the coaching staff led by Dan Quinn.
5c82361ebaecbc19418a3e28e03c515e4cd93e1e.headline: Commanders Hire D.J. Williams as Quarterbacks Coach

b23d3aefd9091630ce7a77a0c33aac265702ca1c.summary: Japan and the Philippines have signed new security agreements, including a deal that allows tax-free provision of ammunition, fuel, and other supplies during joint military training, amid rising regional tensions.
b23d3aefd9091630ce7a77a0c33aac265702ca1c.headline: Japan and Philippines Sign Security Deals to Boost Military

82a5bc1ea10989236db4dae05857d50c72b01da8.summary: Trump has imposed a 25% tariff on imports of certain semiconductors, including some AI chips made by Nvidia. The measure targets specific chip imports in an effort to address trade concerns.
82a5bc1ea10989236db4dae05857d50c72b01da8.headline: Trump Imposes 25% Tariff on Some AI and Nvidia Chip Imports

71fc9d8bbc50a3a154d40e6e702e8164a3369c03.summary: Iran's judiciary stated that Essam Soltani, who was arrested in connection with protests in Karaj, has not been sentenced to death, contradicting earlier reports from a human rights group that his execution was imminent.
71fc9d8bbc50a3a154d40e6e702e8164a3369c03.headline: Iranian Judiciary Says Essam Soltani Not Sentenced to Death

664763cb1c59b650dff56aa3d82f250361020c9d.summary: The United States is withdrawing some personnel from Middle East bases after an Iranian official warned that Iran would target American bases if the U.S. launches strikes. The warning was communicated to neighboring countries, according to Iranian sources.
664763cb1c59b650dff56aa3d82f250361020c9d.headline: US Withdraws Personnel After Iran Warns of Retaliation Over Strikes

0dffac7e04effa021f03176827ff547a50186b56.summary: Uganda is holding an election following a campaign marked by violence, including the teargassing and detention of Bobi Wine supporters. The vote is seen as a test of Yoweri Museveni's political strength, with many expecting him to extend his long tenure.
0dffac7e04effa021f03176827ff547a50186b56.headline: Uganda Holds Election Amid Violence and Tight Security

d543812a6cde2eedc041a0b32200a648b45caa63.summary: Iran temporarily closed its airspace, causing flights to reroute, but later reopened it the same day. The closure occurred amid concerns about possible US military action.
d543812a6cde2eedc041a0b32200a648b45caa63.headline: Iran Temporarily Closes and Reopens Airspace

71cdbecfddd23c562bdb65e737e781e04c1fb47f.summary: The FBI searched Washington Post reporter Hannah Natanson's home and seized her electronic devices as part of a Justice Department investigation into a Pentagon contractor accused of taking home classified information.
71cdbecfddd23c562bdb65e737e781e04c1fb47f.headline: FBI Searches Washington Post Reporters Home in Classified Documents

4277d76f9ff72c6c461f3837af40a219198ca42b.summary: Actor Timothy Busfield appeared in court for the first time on child sex abuse charges and was ordered held without bond after surrendering to authorities.
4277d76f9ff72c6c461f3837af40a219198ca42b.headline: Timothy Busfield Held Without Bond on Child Sex Abuse Charges

82fd33bdcaed965faadb5aabba1c17a505d0dbfd.summary: Kayla Harrison has withdrawn from her scheduled women's bantamweight title defense against Amanda Nunes at UFC 324 due to injury, leading to the postponement of the co-main event, according to the UFC.
82fd33bdcaed965faadb5aabba1c17a505d0dbfd.headline: Kayla Harrison Withdraws From UFC 324 Title Fight Against Amanda Nunes

ed1243a806c9c2d1b645462e40e523284a0c96a6.summary: Quebec Premier François Legault has announced his resignation as leader of the province, following months of turmoil within the Coalition Avenir Québec party. His departure comes ahead of the upcoming fall election.
ed1243a806c9c2d1b645462e40e523284a0c96a6.headline: Quebec Premier François Legault Resigns Ahead of Fall Election

a9ae7c002e93145959e6dabc3c3d267f07b7daa1.summary: Coco Gauff and Venus Williams could face each other in the second round of the 2026 Australian Open, marking their first major meeting since 2019. Gauff is now the No. 3 seed and a two-time major winner, while Williams, 45, enters as a wild card and is set to become the oldest woman to compete in the tournament's main draw. Jannik Sinner and Novak Djokovic are in the same half of the men's draw, allowing for a possible semifinal matchup.
a9ae7c002e93145959e6dabc3c3d267f07b7daa1.headline: Gauff and Williams Could Meet in Australian Open Second Round

c0e28aadc549fe6dd183a8ab2687f8d540fe6485.summary: Britain has temporarily closed its embassy in Tehran following Iran's deadly crackdown on anti-regime protests. The closure comes as concerns rise for foreign nationals' safety in the country.
c0e28aadc549fe6dd183a8ab2687f8d540fe6485.headline: Britain Temporarily Closes Embassy in Tehran Amid Iran Crackdown

45693ffe724503cf34675d8130b81f2341df2463.summary: Washington Wizards guard Trae Young has played in only 10 games this season due to MCL and quad injuries in his right leg. Coach Brian Keefe stated that Young will be reevaluated after the mid-February All-Star break and has not yet played for the Wizards.
45693ffe724503cf34675d8130b81f2341df2463.headline: Wizards Trae Young to Be Reevaluated After All Star Break

4c6abb94b8b298ca2a201fe9eac79f5c704a2296.summary: The Boston Red Sox have signed pitcher Ranger Suárez to a five-year, $130 million contract during the 2025-26 MLB offseason, according to reports. The move marks a significant addition to the team's roster.
4c6abb94b8b298ca2a201fe9eac79f5c704a2296.headline: Red Sox Sign Ranger Suárez to Five Year

d62950a02539080a6352ed29d5159edd32f4c24e.summary: TSMC reported a 35% year-over-year increase in fourth-quarter profit, reaching a record high and surpassing market expectations. The company cited strong demand for advanced chips used in AI and indicated plans to expand with additional factories in the United States.
d62950a02539080a6352ed29d5159edd32f4c24e.headline: TSMC Posts Record Q4 Profit and Plans More US Factories

60237e52c30d7eae6ea360d9c5cee6b3ee531fd6.summary: Brent crude oil prices dropped over 3% as concerns about oversupply resurfaced and comments from Trump eased market fears related to Iran.
60237e52c30d7eae6ea360d9c5cee6b3ee531fd6.headline: Brent Crude Drops Over 3% on Oversupply Concerns and Iran Comments

99830a2266bcf1101886d5035be66dc49f3caec2.summary: Jonathan Kuminga has demanded a trade from the Golden State Warriors, according to league sources. He became eligible to be traded on Thursday following his contract signed this summer. The trade deadline is in three weeks, and other teams, including the Los Angeles Lakers, have reportedly shown interest.
99830a2266bcf1101886d5035be66dc49f3caec2.headline: Jonathan Kuminga Demands Trade from Warriors as Deadline Nears

fe91fc0e205abd0a5137b5c2dd13d24f0e145f54.summary: John Harbaugh has agreed to become the next head coach of the New York Giants, with contract details being finalized. The team is expected to officially hire Harbaugh soon, following the departure of Brian Daboll during the 2025 season.
fe91fc0e205abd0a5137b5c2dd13d24f0e145f54.headline: John Harbaugh Set to Become New York Giants Head Coach

4bae75ed394a86fb4a7961531f425055d3a7ae97.summary: A US appeals court has dismissed the order that released pro-Palestinian activist Mahmoud Khalil from immigration detention, stating the judge lacked jurisdiction. The ruling raises the possibility that Khalil could be re-arrested by immigration authorities.
4bae75ed394a86fb4a7961531f425055d3a7ae97.headline: Appeals Court Overturns Release of Mahmoud Khalil From Detention

ea99743719e469d7b1352b63cc99a3aed2065777.summary: Venezuelan opposition leader Maria Corina Machado met with Donald Trump at the White House, describing the meeting as 'great.' The meeting follows recent U.S. actions against Venezuela and comes as Machado continues to advocate for opposition efforts against President Nicolas Maduro.
ea99743719e469d7b1352b63cc99a3aed2065777.headline: Trump Meets Venezuelan Opposition Leader Machado at White House

322b97d4c41b4b05e84059d5de84a5aa79359782.summary: Clayton Kershaw, who recently ended his MLB career, will pitch for Team USA in the upcoming World Baseball Classic in March, USA Baseball announced. Kershaw, a three-time World Series champion and Cy Young Award winner, previously pitched in the 2013 tournament and had been unable to participate in 2023 due to insurance issues.

e69d5916ab32da59970689932819073484111290.summary: Donald Trump purchased at least $1 million in bonds from Netflix and Warner Bros Discovery, according to a financial disclosure form. The purchase comes shortly after he stated he would be involved in a proposed merger involving Warner Bros, which is also being pursued by Paramount Skydance.
e69d5916ab32da59970689932819073484111290.headline: Trump Buys Over $1 Million in Netflix and Warner Bros Bonds

Greenland's prime minister joined the demonstrations, while European and Canadian leaders condemned Trump's actions and affirmed support for Danish sovereignty.

Nix is set to undergo season-ending surgery. The Broncos will turn to backup quarterback Jarrett Stidham as they advance to the AFC Championship Game.

In the AFC, the Denver Broncos defeated the Buffalo Bills 33-30 in overtime to reach the AFC Championship Game.

Jack Roslovic and Kasperi Kapanen each scored twice. The Canucks have now lost 10 consecutive games, dropping their record to 16-27-5.

Domi also had an assist, while Oliver Ekman-Larsson contributed a goal and two assists. The Maple Leafs finished their four-game road trip with a 2-1-1 record. The Jets, who had won four straight, lost despite goals from Alex Iafallo, Kyle Connor, and Nino Niederreiter.

61001cc058ad9112e70fce03dd6d65a7d0d8f94a.summary: Sequoia is set to join GIC and Coatue in an investment round for AI startup Anthropic, according to multiple reports. This follows a recent leadership overhaul at Anthropic.

Rescue operations are ongoing, with 12 people in intensive care and at least 75 hospitalized. The accident is the deadliest train crash in Spain since at least 2013.

31037c2513a3291a103aa7c01dbb122e7305fe2a.summary: Japan's prime minister, Sanae Takaichi, has announced the dissolution of the lower house and called a snap election for all 465 seats, set for January 23. This will be her first electoral test since taking office in October.
31037c2513a3291a103aa7c01dbb122e7305fe2a.headline: Japans Sanae Takaichi Calls Snap Election for January 23

0a83f64243592098c32585fd4a8498085175cede.summary: The Seattle Seahawks defeated the San Francisco 49ers 41-6, advancing to the NFC Championship Game. The Los Angeles Rams secured their spot in the NFC title game as well, beating the Chicago Bears 20-17 in overtime with a decisive drive led by Matthew Stafford.
0a83f64243592098c32585fd4a8498085175cede.headline: Seahawks and Rams Advance to NFC Championship Game

dc99abdb6d9c4f794709ceb0401d607b064ac93d.summary: As the Denver Broncos prepare to start Jarrett Stidham in the AFC Championship Game against the New England Patriots, Nick Foles, known for leading the Eagles to a Super Bowl win over the Patriots in 2017, offered encouragement to the Broncos following Bo Nix's season-ending injury.
dc99abdb6d9c4f794709ceb0401d607b064ac93d.headline: Broncos Turn to Stidham for AFC Title Game After Nix Injury

15325ecd1a0cbfd314d52e04db2db3fda8d454bb.summary: President Bernardo Arevalo has declared a state of siege in Guatemala following riots and hostage-taking incidents at prisons, where at least seven police officers were killed. Prison hostages have been freed, and authorities attribute the recent surge in unrest to gang activity.
15325ecd1a0cbfd314d52e04db2db3fda8d454bb.headline: Guatemala Declares State of Siege After Deadly Prison Riots

f6ef8a42960bf8166d805debe0162da505004444.summary: Senegal won the Africa Cup of Nations final against Morocco 1-0 after extra time, with Pape Gueye scoring the decisive goal. The match was marked by controversy over a penalty decision that led to Senegal temporarily leaving the field. Morocco missed a penalty before Senegal secured the victory.
f6ef8a42960bf8166d805debe0162da505004444.headline: Senegal Defeats Morocco 1 0 in Controversial AFCON Final

e2ddfac2e54fb6189c56d585d306d9a2f9b5a2e8.summary: Zach Hyman scored two goals and an assist, Ryan Nugent-Hopkins scored in his 1,000th game, and Connor Ingram made 27 saves for a shutout as the Edmonton Oilers defeated the St. Louis Blues 5-0. The Oilers began an eight-game homestand with the win.
e2ddfac2e54fb6189c56d585d306d9a2f9b5a2e8.headline: Oilers Shut Out Blues 5 0 With Hymans Two Goals and Ingrams

d7466fb0aebb9a8f79e8a6d7c36ee0c3c444d00c.summary: Clashes between guerrilla groups in Colombia's Guaviare region have resulted in 27 deaths, according to multiple sources. The groups are reportedly fighting for control of the area.
d7466fb0aebb9a8f79e8a6d7c36ee0c3c444d00c.headline: Clashes Between Guerrilla Groups in Colombia Leave 27 Dead

4a676e6a31cecbcb593c7b5b3b2fe68bd97d6ac7.summary: Kevin Durant scored 18 points to pass Dirk Nowitzki and move into sixth place on the NBA's all-time career scoring list. Jabari Smith Jr. led the Houston Rockets with a season-high 32 points as they defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 119-110.
4a676e6a31cecbcb593c7b5b3b2fe68bd97d6ac7.headline: Durant Moves to Sixth on NBA Scoring List as Rockets Beat Pelicans

b612d988b7d0bd13d83eb76ea9464f39332ffb8b.summary: Donald Trump has established a Board of Peace linked to the Gaza ceasefire, inviting countries including Hungary and India to join. The board's charter requires a $1 billion fee for permanent membership. Tony Blair has distanced himself from involvement. The board is intended to oversee rebuilding efforts, with some noting its mandate may extend beyond Gaza.
b612d988b7d0bd13d83eb76ea9464f39332ffb8b.headline: Trump Launches Gaza Peace Board With $1 Billion Membership Fee

4098da0f22d68611fdd56f5cd2951c8bd1f4144a.summary: Andrew Rosindell, Conservative MP for Romford since 2001, has left the Conservative Party to join Reform UK, citing disagreements over the party's stance on the Chagos Islands. His move follows Robert Jenrick's recent defection to Reform UK.
4098da0f22d68611fdd56f5cd2951c8bd1f4144a.headline: Andrew Rosindell Leaves Conservatives for Reform UK

4ede204913f9277e7d62d5ee2701bca5634b5f5e.summary: A new Oxfam report finds that the number of billionaires reached a record high in the past year, with their collective wealth rising to $18.3 trillion. The report states that the super-rich are significantly more likely to hold political power and own all social media companies. Oxfam also notes that governments have repressed protests over austerity and job shortages.
4ede204913f9277e7d62d5ee2701bca5634b5f5e.headline: Oxfam Billionaires Wealth Hits Record $18.3 Trillion Amid Power

af8fcfbe73b73062c38ca48a5192b3ee774f9a88.summary: The US president has intensified calls for acquiring Greenland, causing political turmoil in the territory. Amid this, the president criticized the Norwegian leader over a Nobel Prize issue and emphasized prioritizing US interests. Other leaders acknowledged the president's role in Ukraine ceasefire efforts.
af8fcfbe73b73062c38ca48a5192b3ee774f9a88.headline: US Presidents Push for Greenland Acquisition Sparks Crisis

3e4d56f337e4885d7cba4b3989bae6670fb662b6.summary: The Los Angeles Rams defeated the Chicago Bears in overtime with a 42-yard field goal by Harrison Mevis, advancing to the NFC Championship game in Seattle. Cobie Durant recorded his third interception of the playoffs during the win.
3e4d56f337e4885d7cba4b3989bae6670fb662b6.headline: Rams Defeat Bears in Overtime to Reach NFC Championship Game

2ba3c8c99afb3a298e8e13c60167c575b23a5a39.summary: World markets reacted and the dollar fell after Trump announced plans to impose tariffs on Europe in response to disputes over Greenland. European governments criticized the move and warned it could lead to a damaging cycle of trade retaliation.
2ba3c8c99afb3a298e8e13c60167c575b23a5a39.headline: Trumps Greenland Tariff Threats Prompt European Criticism and Market

edd9b06e3e6cb2616eb8f613b21645696e1340cc.summary: Ja Morant addressed recent trade rumors after the Grizzlies' win over the Magic, stating he is committed to playing for Memphis and emphasizing his loyalty to the team.

a86803801725de7250c166981a0d1bfaa0b95c03.summary: The NFL postseason is down to four teams: the New England Patriots, Denver Broncos, Los Angeles Rams, and Seattle Seahawks. The Rams defeated the Bears in overtime and will face the Seahawks in the NFC Championship, while the Patriots and Broncos will compete in the AFC Championship. Winners will advance to the Super Bowl.

56cd6de9461395fbeb33f82dc9aa2d593688e9f6.summary: A trial is scheduled to begin Monday in Harry's case against Associated Newspapers, where he and other claimants, including Elton John and Liz Hurley, accuse the publisher of the Daily Mail of illegal acts such as phone hacking and surveillance.
56cd6de9461395fbeb33f82dc9aa2d593688e9f6.headline: Trial to Begin in Harrys Case Against Daily Mail Publisher

01e7da96a3d44adce11c2d9687137ba98a1ab968.summary: Syria's new leaders, who replaced Bashar Assad in December 2024, have secured a cease-fire with a militia after government forces recently seized key assets from the group. The new leadership continues to face challenges in establishing full control over the country.
01e7da96a3d44adce11c2d9687137ba98a1ab968.headline: Syrias New Leaders Secure Cease Fire After Gaining Ground Against

7db13bbae5b373f4f240bfdc4e9d0077db739201.summary: European countries are weighing retaliatory tariffs and other economic actions after Donald Trump threatened new U.S. tariffs in his pursuit of an Arctic island. Discussions among European leaders are ongoing as they consider possible responses.
7db13bbae5b373f4f240bfdc4e9d0077db739201.headline: Europe Considers Retaliatory Tariffs After Trump Threatens New U.S.

e939932c9aaa16cd582e148ed41df4b75878b802.summary: A major fire at Gul Plaza in Karachi lasted over 24 hours before being extinguished, resulting in six deaths and more than 65 people reported missing.
e939932c9aaa16cd582e148ed41df4b75878b802.headline: Karachi Fire at Gul Plaza Leaves Six Dead

Experts warn that the ongoing decrease raises concerns about an aging population, a shrinking workforce, and potential long-term economic effects.
a2d0c7d6b39156099ef60666158636cead49ae41.headline: Chinas Population Falls for Fourth Year as Birthrate Hits Record Low

d42223b2f409b011d256b4c517e32a5b3953263c.headline: Seguro and Ventura Advance to Portugal Presidential Runoff

09272713842575c9df690bb63b783610686bdcad.summary: A '60 Minutes' report on Trump deportations, previously pulled from airing last month, has now been broadcast. The segment was initially withheld, with the correspondent attributing the decision to editor-in-chief Bari Weiss and calling it political in an internal email.
09272713842575c9df690bb63b783610686bdcad.headline: 60 Minutes Airs Trump Deportation Report After Earlier Delay

e6bc7066b907c50f40b59849d63fc4fc8b606733.summary: China's economy met its 5% growth target for 2025 despite a weaker fourth quarter. Experts note that ongoing trade tensions and domestic challenges, such as a slow housing market, continue to affect the country's economic outlook.
e6bc7066b907c50f40b59849d63fc4fc8b606733.headline: China Achieves 5% Growth Target for 2025 Amid Ongoing Economic

ecc9418e397c448a6f5a9beeb51f3c58e3c2d9e2.summary: Daniel Pierce, selected 14th overall in the 2025 draft, is recognized for his strong defensive skills at shortstop and is noted for his physical development since joining the White Sox organization.

d11e5c488d3b2b01969ffd96bcd55c7de4c2be38.summary: The Syrian government and Kurdish-led forces have agreed to an immediate ceasefire and broad integration to end ongoing clashes, according to state media and Reuters. Kurdish commanders had called for stronger US intervention prior to the agreement.
d11e5c488d3b2b01969ffd96bcd55c7de4c2be38.headline: Syrian Government and Kurdish Forces Reach Ceasefire and Integration

d13ce49f7aea1202f88f2ede6cae5d823e96eb3e.summary: The Buffalo Bills have fired head coach Sean McDermott after nine seasons, following their 33–30 overtime playoff loss to the Denver Broncos. Brandon Beane has been promoted to president, and the team is searching for a new head coach to lead the franchise next season.
d13ce49f7aea1202f88f2ede6cae5d823e96eb3e.headline: Buffalo Bills Fire Head Coach Sean McDermott After Playoff Loss

b8a596d0cd800469576065958bbf308063705bc8.summary: President Trump has linked his threats to seize Greenland to not receiving the Nobel Peace Prize, telling Norway's prime minister he no longer feels obliged to 'think purely of Peace.' The statements have heightened tensions with Europe, with the EU preparing to respond.

240be5277fcb172c34ddb7cdbbbd2fdfa21ad471.summary: The Kremlin says Vladimir Putin has been invited by Donald Trump to join the newly formed 'Board of Peace,' which aims to oversee Gaza's reconstruction. Russia is reviewing the offer and seeking clarification from Washington. Invitations have also been extended to leaders from Israel and Kazakhstan. Canada is considering its response as details are finalized.

European and Danish officials rejected the pressure, while leaders called for unity and possible mediation. Gold prices rose as investors sought safety amid trade tensions.
7894cf3dc70f26a7e7cd3ad581bf429d7c5a2cb5.headline: European Stocks Drop After Trump Threatens Tariffs Over Greenland

His funeral is scheduled for this Friday. Valentino's creations were worn by numerous celebrities and public figures over his nearly 50-year career.

The crash, Spain's deadliest rail accident in over a decade, occurred when one train derailed and struck another traveling in the opposite direction. Rescue operations are ongoing, with 41 people hospitalized and authorities investigating the cause.

32d224811e41a5262331544ee5bee5c4996bb959.summary: Seahawks running back Zach Charbonnet will miss the rest of the season after tearing his ACL in Saturday's playoff win over the 49ers. 2ffeabddfbf1e4e3c1355303c36f838c69ba969e.summary: Novak Djokovic began his 2026 Australian Open campaign with a straight-sets win over Pedro Martinez, marking his 100th match victory at the tournament as he pursues a record 25th Grand Slam title.
2ffeabddfbf1e4e3c1355303c36f838c69ba969e.headline: Djokovic Wins 100th Australian Open Match in First Round Victory

475580a0bde8fa5413d717dfef248c202bb7bfbe.summary: Three senior U.S. Catholic archbishops publicly criticized American foreign policy, expressing concern over the morality of recent military actions and questioning the country's global moral leadership.
475580a0bde8fa5413d717dfef248c202bb7bfbe.headline: U.S. Catholic Archbishops Criticize Morality of American Foreign

691afc635c29e3321a48c95ae86a8aab511260c4.summary: Guatemala has declared a 30-day nationwide state of emergency following a surge in gang violence, which included the killing of at least seven police officers and the taking of 46 hostages at three prisons. Authorities blame gangs for the attacks and unrest.

6865f01427d24508d462762d820d7fa3c9595703.summary: The NBA announced the starters for the 2026 All-Star Game, which will feature a new USA vs. World format with three eight-player teams in a round-robin tournament. Jalen Brunson was named a starter, joining Giannis Antetokounmpo, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, Nikola Jokic, Luka Doncic, and Victor Wembanyama among others. The game will take place on February 15 at the Intuit Dome in Inglewood, CA.

ce5a2c618e49008846b2f9e99fc77f30b31ccfa1.summary: Arizona men's basketball is ranked unanimous No. 1 in the AP Top 25 poll for the first time after remaining undefeated at 18-0. Nebraska reached its highest-ever ranking at No. 7. UConn, Michigan, Purdue, and Duke complete the top five.

9f11514203f28b69e39bd2ae88533d05ab6e0bf4.summary: The Rams defeated the Bears, with Sean McVay acknowledging his own 'bad coaching' but crediting the team's strong defense and key plays for securing the win.

1b33569c7ad931119a550b11cc8c2aeb67018db7.summary: The Denver Broncos have signed Ben DiNucci to a contract ahead of the AFC Championship Game after Bo Nix's injury. The Patriots are 4.5-point road favorites over the Broncos, according to DraftKings.

5e91ebfcfcb897d72d19464bb7cda99149646c2b.headline: Thunders Jalen Williams Out With Hamstring Strain

3cff41a3c09f062a2c8df47da48d88e08e510d25.summary: A major fire at a Karachi shopping mall killed at least 23 people, with over 60 still missing as of Monday. Firefighters continue to search the site following an overnight blaze that destroyed hundreds of shops during the busy wedding season.
3cff41a3c09f062a2c8df47da48d88e08e510d25.headline: Karachi Mall Fire Kills at Least 23

0bb75d04d621c67c21f36f6ed9595d85cfe60a30.summary: On Sunday, 60 Minutes broadcast a report on Trump administration deportations that had been removed from the lineup a month earlier. The initial decision to pull the story led to internal disputes at the program over concerns about political influence.
0bb75d04d621c67c21f36f6ed9595d85cfe60a30.headline: 60 Minutes Airs Previously Pulled Report on Trump Deportations

ae81415ae26f3892845f5a08cb29791b05c6c951.summary: The Atlanta Falcons announced that Jeff Ulbrich will remain as defensive coordinator under new head coach Kevin Stefanski, who has chosen to retain him on his staff.
ae81415ae26f3892845f5a08cb29791b05c6c951.headline: Falcons Retain Jeff Ulbrich as Defensive Coordinator Under Stefanski

44ff6b4f01a93090b02196bcfa8e1a74d3a4d078.summary: Japan's prime minister, Sanae Takaichi, has announced plans to dissolve the lower house on January 23 and call a snap parliamentary election, aiming to capitalize on her high approval ratings since taking office as the country's first female prime minister.
44ff6b4f01a93090b02196bcfa8e1a74d3a4d078.headline: Japans Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi Calls Snap Election for January

ebcc81ae5b41d0ebf8ae3049cceaf1c588cdcf75.summary: Conservative leader Kemi Badenoch has urged her party's MPs to prioritize trust and teamwork following Robert Jenrick's defection to Reform. All 116 Conservative MPs have been summoned to a meeting after Nigel Farage set a deadline for further defections. Badenoch addressed concerns about party unity in a letter to MPs.
ebcc81ae5b41d0ebf8ae3049cceaf1c588cdcf75.headline: Badenoch Calls for Unity After Jenrick Defection to Reform

1d564cef859e70c93429e7eadb83c70564894261.summary: Gold and silver prices reached record highs after Donald Trump announced plans for import taxes related to Greenland. The tariff threats led investors to seek safe-haven assets, impacted European carmakers, and caused a drop in the dollar. European stock markets also declined in response.
1d564cef859e70c93429e7eadb83c70564894261.headline: Gold and Silver Hit Record Highs After Trumps Greenland Tariff Threats

aa50c3eb34eca9e332e6ef345ac0504f56e643b5.summary: Investigators examining Sunday's high-speed train derailment in Spain, which resulted in at least 40 deaths, have identified a broken joint on the rails as a possible cause, according to a source familiar with the initial investigation.
aa50c3eb34eca9e332e6ef345ac0504f56e643b5.headline: Broken Rail Joint Found in Deadly Spanish Train Derailment

d1716142db574b33df7ce51c8d4d31782c931dc4.summary: Jakob Junis has agreed to a one-year, $4 million contract with the Texas Rangers, adding depth to their bullpen, according to a source confirmed by ESPN.
d1716142db574b33df7ce51c8d4d31782c931dc4.headline: Jakob Junis Signs One Year

a81e683a7a7411128cd8b74978a43f7e6ff1acaf.summary: A trial has begun in which Prince Harry and six others, including Elton John and Liz Hurley, accuse the publisher of the Daily Mail of unlawful information gathering, such as phone hacking and surveillance. The claimants allege the media company engaged in systematic illegal activities.
a81e683a7a7411128cd8b74978a43f7e6ff1acaf.headline: Prince Harry and Others Begin Trial Against Daily Mail Publisher

5a21c7c0e4a8f828f5f03b05164c1e35e855afc0.summary: Donald Trump has invited nations to join a new U.S.-led board aimed at managing conflicts such as Gaza, with Vladimir Putin also invited to participate. Meanwhile, Minnesota is preparing for the possible arrival of federal troops in response to ongoing immigration protests.
5a21c7c0e4a8f828f5f03b05164c1e35e855afc0.headline: Trump Invites Nations to Join New U.S. Led Board as Minnesota Prepares

5f6a4c4659b2334ed5dd1f14644a716cbc03e10e.summary: The Syrian army has announced it is now in complete control of the city of al-Shaddadi in northeast Syria. Clashes in the area have led to the release of dozens of inmates from a jail holding Islamic State prisoners, with both the Syrian government and Kurdish-led Syrian Democratic Forces blaming each other for the incident.
5f6a4c4659b2334ed5dd1f14644a716cbc03e10e.headline: Syrian Army Claims Control of al Shaddadi Amid Prisoner Release

fcf3c67553ba41f38dc6705bbf5facd0204e4fa4.summary: Prince Harry and six others have accused the publisher of the Daily Mail and Mail on Sunday of serious privacy violations. Prince Harry stated that news stories from the Daily Mail made him feel 'paranoid beyond belief.' Legal proceedings are ongoing.
fcf3c67553ba41f38dc6705bbf5facd0204e4fa4.headline: Prince Harry Alleges Daily Mail Privacy Breaches in Ongoing Case

c162f90e6b077e3cc45fdc61e33f886a53bc26cb.summary: Wildfires in central and southern Chile have killed at least 19 people, destroyed hundreds of homes, and forced evacuations as authorities battle extreme heat and winds. Thousands of acres of forest have been burned.
c162f90e6b077e3cc45fdc61e33f886a53bc26cb.headline: Chile Wildfires Kill 19 and Destroy Hundreds of Homes Amid Heat Wave

874b489352ba160cfa5e360e7a26fe183e33a185.summary: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell is set to attend an event with another central bank member while facing a federal criminal investigation into the central bank's costly renovation project.
874b489352ba160cfa5e360e7a26fe183e33a185.headline: Fed Chair Powell Faces Federal Probe Over Renovation Project

e5f0226ae16f3baa86c329f7244fb16eea2530f4.summary: The Green Bay Packers ended their season with five consecutive losses following Micah Parsons' torn ACL in Week 15. The Pro Football Writers of America also released their rosters on Monday.
e5f0226ae16f3baa86c329f7244fb16eea2530f4.headline: Packers Lose Final Five Games After Parsons Injury

5823e4c4d3a1bb0bcc1c9baf6414e1d384987567.summary: The International Monetary Fund forecasts global economic growth of 3.3% in 2026, citing the positive impact of artificial intelligence advancements, which are expected to offset challenges from trade headwinds.
5823e4c4d3a1bb0bcc1c9baf6414e1d384987567.headline: IMF Projects 3.3% Global Growth in 2026 Driven by AI Advancements
